scraped_articles.title: Hair Quotes: Knowing the Power of Hair in Self-Expression
scraped_articles.meta_description: These hair quotes show us the importance of caring for our hair.
scraped_articles.content:
Hair Quotes: Knowing the Power of Hair in Self-Expression

Check out this collection of hair quotes and discover why it matters more than we might think. (Photo by Valerie Elash on Unsplash)

Hair Quotes: Knowing the Power of Hair in Self-Expression

Hair is often called our "crowned glory." But it's not just about looks. Whether long, short, curly, or straight, our hair tells a story about our culture, health, and personality.

Because of its importance in our lives, people write hair quotes to express their thoughts.

Hair quotes aren't just about cute sayings or funny jokes. These hair quotes also show us the importance of caring for our hair. So, let's read this collection of hair quotes and discover why they matter more than we might think.

Sassy Hair Quotes

1. "I make hair contact before I make eye contact."
2. "My mood depends on how good my hair looks."
3. "All you need is love and great hair."
4. "Life is too short to have boring hair."
5. "Gorgeous hair is the best revenge."
6. "You are cut above the rest."

7. "Sorry I can't hear you over the volume of my hair."
8. "Live colorfully or dye trying."
9. "If my hair looks good, I can deal with anything."
10. "I'm a queen, my hair is my crown."
11. "Flip your hair like you just don't care."
12. "Your hair is 90% your selfie."
13. "My natural hair looks like someone with wavy hair attempted to straighten their hair and failed at it miserably."
14. "I love big hair and I cannot lie."
15. "I don't have grey hair; I have wisdom highlights."

14. "I love big hair and I cannot lie."

15. "I don't have grey hair; I have wisdom highlights."

Funny Hair Quotes

1. "I’d love to kiss ya, but I just washed my hair.” — Bette Davis

(photo by Tim Mossholder on Unsplash)

2. "For three days after death, hair and fingernails continue to grow but phone calls taper off." — Johnny Carson
3. "Live colorfully or dye trying."
4. "People will stare. Make it worth their while." — Harry Winston
5. "You’d find it easier to be bad than good if you had red hair... People who haven’t red hair don’t know what trouble is.” — L.M. Montgomery

6. "Inflation is when you pay fifteen dollars for the ten-dollar haircut you used to get for five dollars when you had hair." — Sam Ewing
7. "It seemed to be a law of society that hair must be parted and brushed.” ― Kate Chopin
8. "“Anyone can be confident with a full head of hair. But a confident bald man – there’s your diamond in the rough.” – Larry David

Hair Quotes About Prioritizing Your Hair

1. "Hair is jewelry. It's an accessory." — Jill Scott
2. “Invest in your hair, it's the crown you never take off.” - Anonymous

3. “People always ask me how long it takes to do my hair. I don't know, I'm never there.” - Dolly Parton

4. “I think that the most important thing a woman can have—next to talent, of course—is her hairdresser.” - Joan Crawford
5. “People who worry about their hair all the time, frankly, are boring.” – Barbara Bush
6. “A woman who cuts her hair is about to change her life.” – Coco Chanel

7. “It doesn’t matter if your life is perfect as long as your hair color is.”- Stacy Snapp Killian

8. “When red-haired people are above a certain social grade their hair is auburn.” —Mark Twain



Hair Quotes

Quotes About The Beauty of Hair

1. "Her albino hair illuminated my dreams, shining brighter than moonlight.” ― Anna Kavan
2. "Life isn't perfect but your hair can be." ― Anonymous
3. “For me, the working of hair is architecture with a human element.” ― Vidal Sassoon

4. “I swear that girl was born with a pen in her hand, the moon in her hair, and stars in her soul.” ― Melody Lee
5. “Her own hair was a glory of copper fire that morning, shining like a whisky still, long and loose in gentle flames down her back.” ― Elizabeth Wein
6. “Her hair falls down like tears” ― Angela Carter
7. "By common sense gray hairs are a crown of glory; the only object of respect that can never excite envy." — George Bancroft
8. "Straight, wavy or curly, if it's healthy, it's beautiful." ― Anonymous

Inspirational Hair Quotes

1. “Hairdressing is not a job, it's a craft." ― Vidal Sassoon
2. "Brushing her hair until it snapped with electricity.” ― Carolyn Keene
3. "Brush your messy hair, embrace a bun, and take on the world." ― Anonymous
4. "I’m as free as my hair." — Lady Gaga

5. “Curling your hair is an intrinsically hopeful act. I like to curl mine at night and think of all the things that could happen tomorrow.” ― Jenny Han
6. “Hair brings one’s self-image into focus; it is vanity’s proving ground. Hair is terribly personal, a tangle of mysterious prejudices.” ― Shana Alexander
7. "It's your hair, do whatever you want." — Anonymous

8. "Hair style is the final tip-off whether or not a woman really knows herself.” ― Hubert De Givenchy

9. “You're only as good as your last haircut.” ― Fran Lebowitz
10. "I wanted to make people feel beautiful so I became a stylist." ― Anonymous

Hair Quotes

scraped_articles.title: The Batman 2 Will Begin Filming in August 2024!
scraped_articles.meta_description: One of the most anticipated movies by Batman fans is about to start filming!
scraped_articles.content:
The Batman 2 Will Begin Filming in August 2024!

One of the most anticipated movies by Batman fans is about to start filming!

The Batman 2 Will Begin Filming in August 2024!

After the huge success of "The Batman", Warner Bros. has officially announced a sequel to the movie.

Again directed by Matt Reeves and starring Robert Pattinson, "The Batman 2" will reportedly start filming this year.

In fact, the second installment of The Batman will reportedly be released shortly after.

Matt Reeves’ ‘THE BATMAN 2’ reportedly begins filming in August 2024 and is set to release in October 2025.

The first movie took 18 months film. pic.twitter.com/DWl8cFrC1M

— Cinema Solace (@SolaceCinema) January 18, 2024

"The Batman 2" will film in August 2024 and release in October 2025.

According to news from Dexerto, "The Batman 2" will begin filming in the middle of this year, in August 2024.

The filming process of the second film from The Batman is rumored to take 18 months.

Then, the film will reportedly be released on October 3, 2025.

Currently, director Matt Reeves is finalizing the script of The Batman 2 with Mattson Tomlin.

In addition, he is also reportedly in the process of developing the "Batverse" in the new DC Universe.

“We’re deep in it and my partner and I are writing, Mattson [Tomlin] and I are writing, and it’s really exciting, and I’m really excited about what we’re doing.”

Is there any official trailer or teaser of "The Batman 2"?

For now, neither Warner Bros. nor Matt Reeves has released a teaser or trailer for "The Batman 2".

However, considering that the teaser for the first movie "The Batman" was released 2 years before the scheduled release, it seems possible that the latest teaser might not be long in coming.

6 Iconic South Korean Actresses Who Played 'Mistress'

6 Iconic South Korean Actresses Who Played 'Mistress'

The character A Mi is played by actress Song Ji-In in the drama LOVE (FT MARRIAGE & DIVORCE). A Mi becomes the mistress of a doctor, Shin Yu Shin. Meeting on the plane, A Mi tried to get close to Shin Yu Shin, who already had a wife.

1. A Mi (Love (ft. Marriage and Divorce))

Yeo Da Kyung in the drama "THE WORLD OF THE MARRIED," becomes one of the successful mistresses. Da Kyung's presence causes Lee Tae Oh and his wife, dr. Ji Sunwoo, divorce. 

2. Yeo Da Kyung (A World of Married)

The character Cheon Seo Jin is played by actress Kim So Yeon. She having an affair with her neighbor, Joo Dan Tae, a real estate entrepreneur. They were in a secret relationship without their partners knowing.

3. Cheon Seo Jin (The Penthouse)

Having an innocent face, On Yoo Ri turns out to be Park Sung Joon's mistress. The affair was revealed when Sung Joon's legal wife became suspicious of them.

With her acting skills, the character of actress Pyo Ye Jin is not liked by the audience.

4. On Yoo Ri (VIP)

The character Min Yoo Ra, played by actress Lee Elijah, is described as a spokesperson who works in the kingdom. However, Yoo Ra mostly tried to get close to the Korean emperor, Lee Hyuk. They had an affair in front of the emperor's legal wife.

5. Min Yoo Ra (The Last Empress)

Yoon Mi Ra (Jeon So Min) is the third person who secretly destroys the household of Sun Joo (Song Yoon Ah) and Myung Seon (Lee Sung Jae). Her character makes the audience angry because Mi Ra and Sun Joo are friends.

6. Yoon Mi Ra (Show Window: The Queen's House)

scraped_articles.title: 60 Quotes About Heartbreak to Heal Your Broken Heart
scraped_articles.meta_description: Heartbreak is painful, but these quotes about heartbreak offer comfort and guidance to help you heal and move forward from the past.
scraped_articles.content:
60 Quotes About Heartbreak to Heal Your Broken Heart

Heartbreak is a painful experience that many people go through. It can make you feel lost, sad, and alone. In tough times like this, you might find comfort in quotes about heartbreak. These quotes can remind you that you are not alone in your feelings and that others have faced similar situations.

Dealing with heartbreak is never easy. The pain can seem overwhelming, and it can feel hard to move on. Quotes about heartbreak can provide comfort and help you find a way to express your feelings. Reading these quotes can remind you that you are not alone, and many others have felt this way, too. They can inspire you and give you hope for healing.

In this article, we have selected some of the most powerful quotes about heartbreak from various sources, Thursday (21/11/2024). These quotes are thoughtful, inspiring, and relatable, making them perfect for anyone who is struggling. Let's dive in and explore them together.

Short Quotes About Heartbreak

1. "They always say the hottest love has the coldest end." - Drake

2. "Love can be magic. But magic can sometimes... just be an illusion." - Javan

3. "Tears may be dried up, but the heart - never." - Marguerite Gardiner, Countess of Blessington

4. "Hearts are made to be broken." - Oscar Wilde

Touching Quotes About Heartbreak

5. "So it's true, when all is said and done, grief is the price we pay for love." - E.A. Bucchianeri

6. "Heartbreak is a loss. Divorce is a piece of paper." - Taylor Jenkins Reid

7. "No matter where you go, you will always be in my heart." - Anthony T. Hincks

8. "Tis better to have loved and lost than never to have loved at all." - Alfred Lord Tennyson

9. "Our greatest joy and our greatest pain come in our relationship with others." - Stephen R. Covey

10. "Pleasure of love lasts but a moment. Pain of love lasts a lifetime." - Bette Davis

11. I gave you my heart, I just didn't expect to get it back in pieces." - Unknown

12. "You can't buy love, but you can pay heavily for it." - Henny Youngman

13. "It is strange how often a heart must be broken before the years can make it wise." - Sara Teasdale

14. "Loving you was like going to war; I never came back the same." - Warsan Shire

15. "To fall in love is awfully simple, but to fall out of love is simply awful." - Bess Myerson

16. "I'd rather have a broken arm than a broken heart." - Christie Brinkley

17. "Love begins with a smile, grows with a kiss, and ends with a teardrop." - Saint Augustine

18. "What is the opposite of two? A lonely me, a lonely you." - Richard Wilbur

19. "To weep is to make less the depth of grief." - William Shakespeare

20. "The shattering of a heart when being broken is the loudest quiet ever." - Carroll Bryant

Touching Quotes About Heartbreak

1. "You can't have Heartbreak without love. If your heart was really broken, then at least you know you really loved him." - Leila Sales

2. "One day you're going to remember me and how much I loved you … then you're going to hate yourself for letting me go." - Drake

3. "Ever has it been that love knows not its own depth until the hour of separation." - Kahlil Gibran

4. "If you love deeply, you're going to get hurt badly. But it's still worth it." - C. S. Lewis

5. "Better a broken heart than a hardened one." - Dalia Mogahed

6. "You can close your eyes to the things you don't want to see, but you can't close your heart to the things you don't want to feel." - Johnny Depp

7. "Hearts can break. Yes, hearts can break. Sometimes I think it would be better if we died when they did, but we don't." - Stephen King

8. "And they can't understand, what hurts more—missing the other person, or pretending not to." - Khadija Rupa

9. "You know someone is very special to you when days just don't seem right without them." - John Cena

10. "One day you're going to remember me and how much I loved you … then you're going to hate yourself for letting me go." - Aubrey Drake Graham

11. "You will never know true happiness until you have truly loved, and you will never understand what pain really is until you have lost it." - Unknown

12. "Stab the body and it heals, but injure the heart and the wound lasts a lifetime." - Mineko Iwasaki

13. "When we miss someone often, what we really miss is the part of us that with this someone awakens." - Luigina Sgarro

14. "There is an ocean of silence between us… and I am drowning in it." - Ranata Suzuki

15. "Thinking of you is a poison I drink often." - Atticus

16. "This is a good sign, having a broken heart. It means we have tried for something." - Elizabeth Gilbert

17. "The emotion that can break your heart is sometimes the very one that heals it." - Nicholas Sparks

18. "Hearts will never be practical until they are made unbreakable." - Tin Man

19. "The saddest thing about love is that not only that it cannot last forever, but that heartbreak is soon forgotten." - William Faulkner

20. "I wish I were a little girl again because skinned knees are easier to fix than a broken heart." - Julia Roberts

Powerful Quotes to Heal Your Broken Heart

1. "The heart will break, but broken live on." - Lord Byron

2. "Love is never lost. If not reciprocated it will flow back and soften and purify the heart." -Washington Irving

3. "It takes a lot of strength to mend a broken heart. Being able to accept situations for what they are instead of questioning them helps immensely." - Deepika Padukone

4. "Let go. Why do you cling to pain? There is nothing you can do about the wrongs of yesterday. It is not yours to judge. Why hold on to the very thing which keeps you from hope and love?" - Leo Buscaglia

5. "Letting go means to come to the realization that some people are a part of your history but not a part of your destiny." - Steve Maraboli

6. "I've been heartbroken. I've broken hearts. That's part of life, and it's part of figuring out who you are so you can find the right partner." -Heidi Klum

7. "Every time your heart is broken, a doorway cracks open to a world full of new beginnings, new opportunities." - Patti Roberts

8. "You think your pain and your Heartbreak are unprecedented in the history of the world, but then you read. It was books that taught me that the things that tormented me most were the very things that connected me with all the people who were alive, who had ever been alive." - James Baldwin

9. "When your heart is broken, you plant seeds in the cracks and you pray for rain." - Andrea Gibson

10. "Sometimes good things fall apart so better things can fall together." - Marilyn Monroe

11. "The cure for a broken heart is simple, my lady. A hot bath and a good night's sleep." - Margaret George

12. "Sadness flies away on the wings of time." - Jean De La Fontaine

13. "Only time can heal your broken heart. Just as only time can heal his broken arms and legs." - Miss Piggy

14. "A broken heart is just the growing pains necessary so that you can love more completely when the real thing comes along." - J.S.B. Morse

15. "Don't cry when the sun is gone, because the tears won't let you see the stars." - Violeta Parra

16. "When you are standing in [a] forest of sorrow, you cannot imagine that you could ever find your way to a better place. But if someone can assure you that they themselves have stood in that same place, and now have moved on, sometimes this will bring hope." - Elizabeth Gilbert

17. "With time the pain eases, the body recovers and the brain figures out new ways to go on." - Federico Chini

18. "Sometimes it takes a heartbreak to shake us awake and help us see we are worth so much more than we're settling for." - Mandy Hale

19. "In three words I can sum up everything I've learned about life: it goes on." - Robert Frost

20. "Don't cry because it's over. Smile because it happened." - Dr. Seuss

scraped_articles.title: How to Reduce Body Heat Naturally: 6 Tips And 7 Cooling Foods
scraped_articles.meta_description: Are you feeling hot? Here are some tips on how to reduce body heat naturally.
scraped_articles.meta_keywords: How To Reduce Body Heat,Tips To Reduce Body Heat,Causes Of High Body Heat,Body Heat
scraped_articles.content:
How to Reduce Body Heat Naturally: 6 Tips And 7 Cooling Foods

How to Reduce Body Heat Naturally: 6 Tips And 7 Cooling Foods

Are you feeling a little too hot and bothered? Do you ever wonder how to reduce body heat? Whether you're out in the sun, exercising, or just feeling overly warm, there are simple and effective ways to cool down and reduce body heat.

The human body has a natural way of regulating its temperature, but sometimes, it needs a little help to stay cool. Knowing how to reduce body heat is important in preventing heat-related illnesses such as heat exhaustion and heat stroke. By understanding the causes of body heat, you can take the necessary steps to keep your body at a comfortable and safe temperature.

In this article, we will share some tips on how to reduce body heat naturally, according to various sources, Monday (8/1/2024).

From staying hydrated to wearing the right clothing, there are plenty of easy and practical ways to stay cool and comfortable, even on the hottest of days. So, if you're looking for ways on how to reduce body heat and beat the heat, keep reading for some helpful tips and tricks.

A. Common Causes of High Body Heat

1. Physical Activity: Participating in demanding physical activities, like intense workouts or exercise, can make your body temperature go up. This happens because your body naturally produces heat when you're being very active.

2. Infections: Illnesses like flu, urinary tract infections, or other infections can cause a rise in body temperature. The body increases its temperature to create an environment less favorable for the growth of certain bacteria or viruses.

3. Dehydration: When your body doesn't have enough fluids, it struggles to cool down through sweating. Dehydration can lead to an increase in body heat. It's important to drink an adequate amount of water to maintain proper body temperature.

4. Weather Conditions: Hot weather, especially when combined with high humidity, can cause your body temperature to rise. In such conditions, your body may have difficulty releasing heat, leading to an increase in overall body temperature.

Causes

5. Medications: Some medications, like certain antibiotics or drugs for treating thyroid disorders, may have side effects that include an increase in body temperature. It's crucial to be aware of potential side effects when taking medications.

6. Hormonal Changes: Fluctuations in hormones, such as those that occur during menstruation, pregnancy, or menopause, can influence body temperature regulation. These hormonal changes may lead to an increase in body heat at certain times.

B. How to Reduce Body Heat Naturally

1. Drink Plenty of Water: Make sure you stay well-hydrated by drinking enough water throughout the day. Water helps control your body temperature by facilitating the cooling process through sweating.

2. Cooling Foods: Include foods with natural cooling properties in your meals. Choose for items like mint, coconut water, and leafy greens, which can contribute to lowering body heat. These foods help maintain a balanced internal temperature.

Tips To Reduce Body Heat Naturally

3. Dress Lightly: Choose loose-fitting, light-colored clothing, especially during hot weather. This allows better air circulation around your body, aiding in the evaporation of sweat and cooling you down naturally.

4. Cooling Baths: Take refreshing baths, especially using cool or lukewarm water. Adding a few drops of essential oils like peppermint or eucalyptus can enhance the cooling effect. This helps dissipate excess heat from the body.

Tips 

5. Limit Spicy Foods: Reduce the intake of spicy and hot foods, as they can contribute to an increase in body heat. Choose milder seasonings and incorporate more cooling herbs like coriander and fennel into your meals.

6. Mindful Rest: Make sure you have sufficient and quality sleep. Lack of rest can disrupt your body's ability to control temperature. Create a cool and comfortable sleeping environment to improve your body's natural cooling mechanisms during rest.

C. Cooling Foods To Reduce Body Heat

1. Watermelon: Watermelon has a high water content and is rich in vitamins A and C. It not only helps in staying hydrated but also has a cooling effect on the body.

2. Cucumber: With its high water content and minimal calories, cucumber is known for its hydrating properties. Including cucumber in your diet can help in reducing body heat.

3. Mint: Mint leaves have a refreshing and cooling effect. You can add fresh mint to salads and drinks or make a soothing mint tea to help lower body temperature.

4. Coconut Water

Coconut water is a natural electrolyte-rich beverage that helps in rehydration. It also provides a cooling effect and is a great alternative to sugary drinks.

5. Yogurt: Yogurt is a probiotic-rich food that can aid digestion and has a cooling effect on the body. Opt for plain yogurt without added sugars for the best results.

6. Cilantro: Cilantro has cooling properties and can be used as an herb in various dishes. It not only adds flavor but also contributes to maintaining a balanced body temperature.

7. Buttermilk: Buttermilk is a low-fat dairy product rich in probiotics and has a natural cooling effect on the body. It's an excellent choice for reducing body heat. Enjoy it on its own or with added spices for a refreshing and hydrating beverage, especially in hot weather.

scraped_articles.title: 31 Rest In Peace Quotes: Eternal Remembrance of Your Loved Ones
scraped_articles.meta_description: During these difficult times, rest in peace-quotes can be like a warm hug for our souls.
scraped_articles.content:
31 Rest In Peace Quotes: Eternal Remembrance of Your Loved Ones

During these difficult times, rest in peace-quotes can be like a warm hug for our souls.

31 Rest In Peace Quotes: Eternal Remembrance of Your Loved Ones

When someone we love dies, it feels like the world stops. Our hearts also stop because of sadness.

During these difficult times, rest in peace-quotes can be like a warm hug for our souls.

This quote is to remind us of the beautiful times. The memories
will always be remembered.

Rest in peace quotes as a reminder that our loved ones may be gone, but their affection will always be there.

Rest In Peace Quotes to Write on Condolences Card

  • My sincere condolences to you on your great loss. You and your family would be in my thoughts and prayers. Please stay strong!
  • May his soul rest in peace. Sending my deepest condolence to the family of the deceased.
  • Our beloved (their name) never knew peace in their life, and so we don't hope for peace in their afterlife. Instead, we wish they get the greatest adventures we could ever imagine.
  • I am deeply saddened by the loss of your mother. God rest her soul.
  • I express my greatest condolences at the news of his sudden death. May he rest in peace.

  • May your memories with him/her give you the strength to carry on with your life. Hope his/her soul rests in peace.
  • Rest in peace, sister! The world won’t be the same without you. You will always live in our hearts.
  • Nothing is more painful in this world than losing someone you love so dearly. I am so much broken but I will pray for your departed soul in every moment of my life.
  • What a life (their name) must have lived for so many people to share in this sadness together.
  • The tragedy of your death has left a deep wound in my heart. May your soul rest in peace.

  • (Their name) was always fascinated by the night sky, and now they've joined the stars they loved so much.
  • I am extremely shocked and saddened by your loss, dear. May his/her eternal sleep be full of peace.
  • (Their name) leaves behind a legacy filled with brightness - something they're sure to pass on from wherever they are.
  • They never feared the end because they knew they'd lived every moment to the fullest.
  • With our greatest condolences, we send (their name) off to their everlasting peace.

  • The goodness of her soul has touched the hearts of many, and she will always be fondly remembered. Rest in peace.
  • I don’t remember when was the last time I cried this much. You have left some wonderful memories that will never fade from my heart. Rest in peace!
  • Sending my deep and heartfelt sympathy to you and your family. My heart goes out to you on the passing of your brother.
  • Working was fun with him/her. I am so sorry to hear about the loss of such an amazing person. My thoughts are with you.

  • You will be missed forever and always. The beautiful moments you shared with us will always speak of the great person that you were. Rest in peace up in heaven!

  • Inna lillahi wa inna ilaihi rajiun. May Allah (s.w.t.) grant him/her Jannatul-Firdaus and forgive his/her sins.
  • He was a person with a heart of gold. He will be missed by many. May his soul rest in peace.

Rest In Peace Quotes from Books and Movies

  • "Your absence has gone through me like thread through a needle. Everything I do is stitched with its color." - W.S. Merwin
  • "The love inside, you take it with you." - Ghost
  • "As long as there is love and memory, there is no true loss." - Cassandra Clare
  • "A single person is missing for you, and the whole world is empty." - Joan Didion
  • "Ohana means family, and family means nobody is left behind or forgotten." - Lilo & Stitch
  • "Don't grieve. Anything you lose comes round in another form." - Rumi

  • "When we die, our bodies become the grass, and the antelope eat the grass. And so we are all connected in the great circle of life." - The Lion King
  • "Death is a natural part of life. Rejoice for those around you who transform into the Force. Mourn them, do not. Miss them, do not." - Star Wars: Revenge of the Sith
  • "I think we dream so we don't have to be apart for so long. If we're in each other's dreams,
    we can be together all the time." -     A.A. Milne

Author

Larasati Natasha (intern)

scraped_articles.title: Love You Forever Quotes and Sayings to Make Them Smile
scraped_articles.meta_description: These special words are to capture the meaning of endless love in a simple way.
scraped_articles.content:
Love You Forever Quotes and Sayings to Make Them Smile

These special words are to capture the meaning of endless love in a simple way.

Love You Forever Quotes and Sayings to Make Them Smile

Have you ever wanted to express your love in words but found it hard to find the right ones?

Well, you’re in luck!

Here, we've gathered a collection of heartwarming 'love you forever quotes.'

These special words are to capture the meaning of endless love in a simple way.

The love of family or romantic partners has the power to make us feel valued and cherished.

We would gladly spend forever with them. That’s why people look for the perfect words to express their feelings.

Check out this collection of love you forever quotes and share them to your partner!

1. “Maybe I’m too late to be your first. But right now I’m preparing to be your last.” – Mr. Sid

2. “When you realize you want to spend the rest of your life with somebody, you want the rest of your life to start as soon as possible.” – Nora Ephron

3. “I would rather spend one lifetime with you, than face all the ages of this world alone.” – J.R.R. Tolkien

4. “Forever is never long enough when it’s spent with you.” – Unknown

5. “You are stuck with me till the world falls to pieces, and if we’re not still standing even then we’ll still find a way to be together…” – Ottilie Weber

6. “Once upon a time there was a boy who loved a girl, and her laughter was a question he wanted to spend his whole life answering.” – Nicole Krauss

7. “He is not a lover who does not love forever.” – Euripides

8. “Each time you love, love as deeply as if it were forever.” – Audre Lorde

9. “As we grow older together, as we continue to change with age, there is one thing that will never change. I will always keep falling in love with you.” – Karen Coldfelder

10. “If love never lasts forever, then what’s forever for?” – Michael Murphy

11. “I’ll love you until the last breath leaves my body and my heart no longer beats.” – Alex Grayson

12. “If there ever comes a day when we can’t be together, keep me in your heart. I’ll stay there forever.” – A.A. Milne

13. “Once upon a time there was a boy who loved a girl, and her laughter was a question he wanted to spend his whole life answering.” – Nicole Krauss

14. “Love is like a friendship caught on fire. In the beginning a flame, very pretty, often hot and fierce, but still only light and flickering. As love grows older, our hearts mature and our love becomes as coals, deep-burning and unquenchable.” – Bruce Lee


15. “I don’t know how many nights remain to us, but I know I want to spend them all with you.” – Nenia Campbell

16. “What we once enjoyed and deeply loved we can never lose, for all that we love deeply becomes part of us.” – Helen Keller

17. “I can’t promise you forever, because that’s not long enough.” – Jason Dorsey

18. “You may hold my hand for a while, but you hold my heart forever.” – Nicole Louise Divino

19. “Everything we are, together, is what we’re meant to be.” – Frances De Pontes Peebles

20. “Until every last star in the galaxy dies. You have me.” – Annie Kaufman

21. “Listen, I love you. You make my world. And I’m here for you now, and forever. I’m here.” – Pat Pace

22. “Gifts are temporary and often forgotten; love is forever and always remembered.” – Ken Poirot

23. “With all my heart, and all my soul, I will love you till the winds don’t blow. Until the oceans turn to stone, my love is yours and yours alone. My love is forever, until forever’s gone.” – Kenny Rogers

Zodiac Signs Most Confident

1. Taurus (April 20 - May 20)

Taurus individuals are famous for their unwavering self-confidence. They have a strong sense of self-worth.

The opinions of others do not easily sway Taurus. Their determination and perseverance make them stand out in any situation. Taurus people are often admired for their ability to stay on the ground and manage, even in the face of challenges.

Aries individuals are known for their boldness and fearlessness. They have an innate ability to take charge and lead others.

2. Aries (March 21 - April 19)

Aries people are not afraid to take risks. They are always ready to face any barrier that comes their way. Their confidence is infectious, and people are naturally drawn to their charismatic personalities.

Leo individuals are natural-born leaders who exude confidence effortlessly. They have a regal aura about them that demands attention and respect.

3. Leo (July 23 - August 22)

Leos are fearless in showing their talents and abilities. They thrive in the spotlight. Their self-assured nature makes them irresistible to others, and they often find themselves surrounded by admirers.

Scorpios are known for their intense and mysterious nature, which adds to their confidence. They deeply understand themselves and are not afraid to explore their emotions. Scorpios' magnetic presence draws people in, and their self-assuredness is stunning. Their confidence is often seen as a challenge, making them even more sensual.

4. Scorpio (October 23 - November 21)

Virgo individuals may initially seem reserved, but a strong sense of self-assurance lies beneath their calm exterior.

5. Virgo (August 23 - September 22)

They have a complex nature and pay attention to every detail, which boosts their confidence in their abilities.

Virgos have high standards for themselves and are not easily swayed by others' opinions. Their enthusiasm is grounded in their practicality and analytical thinking.

Zodiac Signs Most Confident

Pisces individuals have a unique and charming aura that delights those around them. They have a deep sense of empathy and understanding, adding to their confidence. Pisces people are not afraid to express their emotions and are comfortable with their openness. Their self-assuredness comes from their ability to connect with others on a deep level.

6. Pisces (February 19 - March 20)

Aquarius are known for their eccentricity and individuality, which contribute to their confidence. They have a strong sense of self and are brave to express their opinions and ideas.

7. Aquarius (January 20 - February 18)

Aquarius people are often seen as trendsetters and trailblazers. Their confidence in their uniqueness is what sets them apart. Their self-assuredness attracts others who are attracted to their authenticity.

It's important to note that confidence is not limited to these zodiac signs alone. Every individual has the potential to develop self-assurance and develop their unique presence. However, these zodiac signs naturally have qualities that make them stand out in terms of confidence. They are the zodiac signs that are often respected for their self-trust. Their natural confidence and magnetic presence make them beautiful. Whether it's their willpower, fearlessness, regal aura, spirited nature, care, empathy, or eccentricity, these signs have qualities. Confidence is not limited to astrology, and everyone has the potential to embrace their unique pride.

scraped_articles.title: 6 Must-See Movies About Freemasons/Illuminati and Their Rituals
scraped_articles.meta_description: These six movies are about Freemasons and the Illuminati exploring their mysterious rituals, symbolism, and societal influence.
scraped_articles.meta_keywords: Movies About Freemasons/Illuminati,Movies About Freemasons,Movies About Illuminati,Freemason,Illuminati,news,timeless,Article,Movie,Movies,film,films,mystery,horror
scraped_articles.content:
6 Must-See Movies About Freemasons/Illuminati and Their Rituals

6 Must-See Movies About Freemasons/Illuminati and Their Rituals

Are you delighted by secret societies and mysterious rituals? If so, you might enjoy watching movies that explore the world of Freemasons/Illuminati.

Freemasons have long been the subject of mystery and conspiracy theories, making them popular in film. Here are six must-see movies that explore the world of Freemasons and the Illuminati, along with their intriguing rituals:



Movies About Freemasons/Illuminati

1. The Freemason (2013)

First on our list is "The Freemason," a thriller about a detective investigating a series of murders linked to Freemasonry. The movie explores the organization's rituals and secrets. This film will keep viewers on the edge of their seats. You can watch "The Freemason" on Amazon Prime.

2. 33 & Beyond: The Royal Art of Freemasonry (2017)

This documentary takes a deep dive into the history and symbolism of Freemasonry.

It follows to solve the mysteries behind this ancient fraternity. It sheds light on the rituals and traditions passed down through generations. You can stream this movie on Amazon Prime or Apple TV.

3. The Imaginarium of Doctor Parnassus (2009)

In this fantasy film, a traveling theater troupe led by Doctor Parnassus encounters the mysterious Mr. Nick, who offers them a Faustian deal.

The film explores themes of temptation and morality. It also brings elements of mystery and intrigue reminiscent of secret societies. You can watch this movie on Netflix.

"The Da Vinci Code" is based on Dan Brown's best-selling novel; this thriller follows symbologist Robert Langdon.

4. The Da Vinci Code (2006)

He uncovers a conspiracy involving the Catholic Church and the secret society known as the "Priory of Sion." The film discovers the history of the Illuminati and their influence on world events. You can stream this movie on Amazon Prime or Hulu.

This adventure film follows treasure hunter Benjamin Gates as he searches for a hidden treasure.

5. National Treasure (2004)

It is rumored to be linked to the Knights Templar, a medieval order associated with Freemasonry. The movie combines history, mystery, and action as Gates solves clues left by America's founding fathers. You can watch this movie on Disney+.

6. The Game (1997)

This psychological thriller follows Nicholas Van Orton, a wealthy but isolated banker.

He gets caught up in a high-stakes game that challenges his perception of reality. While not directly about Freemasons or the Illuminati, the film touches on themes of manipulation and control often associated with secret societies. You can stream this movie on Amazon Prime.

These six movies are about Freemasons and the Illuminati exploring their mysterious rituals, symbolism, and societal influence.

Whether you're interested in history, mystery, or conspiracy theories, these films will entertain viewers of all ages. So grab some popcorn, settle in, and get ready to uncover the secrets of these enigmatic organizations.

Coca-Cola is a very popular carbonated soft drink franchise owned by "Coca-Cola Company".

This carbonated soft drink is known to have delightful flavor and many variants.

Recently, Coca-Cola is reported to have co-worked with Artificial Intelligence.

This "cooperation" was done by Coca-Cola Company to make a new flavor.

The limited-edition drink, labeled Frutiger Aero-esque, was produced with an AI text-to-image model called Stable Diffusion.

The drink is a part of Coca-Cola's "Creations" line.

This line is a range of drinks that the company launched in February 2022 to appeal to Gen-Z consumers.

In general, this "Coca-Cola Y3000" provides the typical Coca-Cola flavor, however, some people claim that there are additional flavors of raspberry, strawberry, and some other fruits.

Coca-Cola is not the only brands that have cooperate with Artificial Intelligence.

Other food and drink giants, including Kraft Heinz and Artwater Brewery, have also been letting AI lend a hand in the food lab, roll out advertising campaigns, and provide a novel selling point to consumers.

scraped_articles.content:
Russian Woman Marries Adopted Child That 31 Years Younger Than Her, Becomes Controversy

Russian Woman Marries Adopted Child That 31 Years Younger Than Her, Becomes Controversy

A 53-year-old Russian woman from Tatarstan has caused controversy. She married a 22-year-old man she had cared for for the past eight years.

Aisylu Chizhevskaya-Mingalim is a famous musician in Tatarstan.

She is the nephew of famous singer Renata Ibragimov.

Eight years ago, while teaching music at a Kazan orphanage, Aisylu met Daniil, a 13-year-old boy. They share a love of music.

When he was 14 years old, Daniil became Aisylu's adopted son. They have lived together since then.

On October 20, they were legally married.

"Our marriage was on a completely different level; a family bound by creativity could not be separated." 

Aisylu Chizhevskaya-Mingalim shared. She added that many people do not fully understand the situation.

© trstdly 2023

Aisylu Chizhevskaya-Mingalim clarified that her relationship with Daniil has gone a long way. That's what decided them to get married.

"When difficult times happen, my main concern is for Daniil," explains Aisylu Chizhevskaya-Mingalim.

"He love music, not conflict. At the same time, he reached the age where young men were expected to take up arms.

I started thinking about how to protect it. In an informal conversation with some people, they suggested this unusual thing. Approach—marrying him for his protection."

"Daniil is now an adult, and together we have six children: five adopted children and my biological son," added the 53-year-old woman.

"In this way, Daniil took on the role of father of many children while staying in our home."

The Russian woman confirmed that their marriage was legal. However, she claimed that their relationship was primarily spiritual and not physical.

The marriage of the 53-year-old singer and her 22-year-old adopted son caused controversy in the Republic of Tatarstan.

Some even called Chizhevskaya-Mingalim a "shame" for the country.

scraped_articles.title: "Is Kimchi Really Good for Your Skin?" Here are the Facts!
scraped_articles.meta_description: Eating more fermented foods is good for physical and mental health.
scraped_articles.content:
"Is Kimchi Really Good for Your Skin?" Here are the Facts!

Eating more fermented foods is good for physical and mental health.

'Is Kimchi Really Good for Your Skin?' Here are the Facts!

Kimchi

Kimchi is a popular traditional Korean dish. Kimchi is made by fermenting salted vegetables. This food is rich in nutrients and probiotics. Kimchi can boost the immune system and reduce inflammation.


A kimchi recipe includes cabbage and flavorings such as sugar, salt, shallots, garlic, ginger, and chilies.
In addition, different other vegetables such as radishes, celery, carrots, cucumbers, eggplants, spinach, leeks, beets, and bamboo shoots can also be included.

Kimchi is usually left to ferment for several days to weeks before consumption. But kimchi can also be consumed fresh directly.

So, is kimchi good for the skin, too?

Fermented foods produce probiotics, beneficial bacteria, and yeast that support gut health.

Let's first explore the concept of the gut-skin axis.

According to Dr. Batul Patel, celebrity dermatologist and founder of The Bombay Skin Clinic, a healthy gut can be seen from the skin.

'A healthy gut can be reflected on the skin.

The gut-skin axis concept suggests that an unhealthy gut can lead to inflammatory skin conditions such as acne, rosacea, and eczema. Probiotics, such as those found in kimchi, can support a balanced gut microbiome,'

said Dr. Batul Patel.

But how exactly does Kimchi improve skin quality?

The secret is in the components.

Kimchi fermentation produces probiotics. It can reduce body inflammation which is caused acne problems.

Kimchi also contains vitamin C and specific B vitamins. Vitamin C is important in producing collagen, the protein that keeps our skin firm and youthful.


The minerals in kimchi are also for supporting glowing skin.

Ingredients in kimchi, such as ginger and garlic, can make skin smoother and cleaner.

Although the fiber in kimchi may not directly impact skin texture, it supports a healthy digestive system. Of course, it is related to the health of our skin.

However, skin health depends on various factors.


It all depends on genetics, overall diet, hydration, sun exposure and skin care routine.

scraped_articles.title: Here's a Photo of the Statue of King Ramses II Found in the Mission of Egyptian and US Archaeologists
scraped_articles.meta_description: Here's a Photo of the Statue of King Ramses II Found in the Mission of Egyptian and US Archaeologists
scraped_articles.content:
Here's a Photo of the Statue of King Ramses II Found in the Mission of Egyptian and US Archaeologists

Here's a Photo of the Statue of King Ramses II Found in the Mission of Egyptian and US Archaeologists

A joint archaeological mission between Egypt and the United States has uncovered the top of a giant statue of King Ramses II during excavations in the southern Egyptian city of Minya, Egypt's Ministry of Tourism and Historical Wealth said on Monday (4/3/).

The head of the Egyptian team related to the mission, Bassem Jihad, said in a statement that the limestone block found was about 3.8 meters high. The block depicts a seated Ramses II wearing a double crown and headdress adorned with a royal cobra.

The top of the statue's rear column shows a hieroglyphic inscription that means to glorify the king, one of the most powerful pharaohs in ancient Egypt.

The third pharaoh of Egypt's Nineteenth Dynasty, also known as Ramses the Great, ruled from 1279 to 1213 BCE.

W, combined with its lower part excavated decades ago, the statue will reach about seven meters in size.

The city of El Ashmunein, located on the west bank of the Nile, was known as Khemnu in Ancient Egypt. In Greco-Roman times, it was known as Hermopolis Magna, which was the regional capital.

Mustafa Waziri, head of Egypt's Supreme Council of Antiquities, stated that the research confirmed the similarity between the upper part of the statue and the lower part previously discovered by German archaeologist Gunther Roeder in 1930.

According to Waziri, the mission is to clean and prepare the block before reconstructing a complete statue model if the two parts are combined.

scraped_articles.title: 30 Mean Friends Quotes: How to Rise Above the Negativity
scraped_articles.meta_description: Words can be really powerful, especially when they come from people we thought were our friends. Same like when we heard mean friends quotes.
scraped_articles.content:
30 Mean Friends Quotes: How to Rise Above the Negativity

30 Mean Friends Quotes: How to Rise Above the Negativity

Have you ever felt hurt by something a friend said? Words can be really powerful, especially when they come from people we thought were our friends. Same like when we heard mean friends quotes. Whether it's a mean comment or a sarcastic compliment, words from friends can sometimes hurt the most.

That's why mean friends quotes from unkind friends can really leave a mark on us. But sometimes, hidden behind these negative words, there's something important to learn or understand.

In this article, we'll look at some mean friends quotes and see what lessons we can take from them.

Mean Friends Quotes to Help You Deal with Them

  • “Make friends with good people and enjoy your life. It’s far better than being around people who make you miserable.” – by Booker T. Washington

  • “You won’t get through life without people making you upset or treating you badly. God will take care of the people who treat you this way. If you’re bitter towards them, this bitterness will affect you too.” –Will Smith

  • “The more you ignore mean people, the better your life will become.” – Mandy Hale

  • “You shouldn’t let mean people take away all of your accomplishments. It’s your success. Don’t let anyone else ruin it for you.” – Taylor Swift

  • “Be kind to people even when they treat you badly. You will be the one who will win in the end.” – Alex Elle

Mean Friends Quotes

  • “People tend to be mean when they are hurting inside. They have bitterness in their hearts and it bothers them to a point where they have to hurt other people. They do this just to make themselves feel better.” – Laura Moriarty

  • “People who talk about you when your back is turned are in the perfect position to kiss a particular part of your anatomy.”

  • “The most evil people in the world are those who aren’t aware of how evil they really are.”

  • “Just because people are mean doesn’t mean you have to follow suit.” – Amy March, Little Women

  • “Mean things are always funny when you’re not on the receiving end of it.” –Will Rogers

  • “Don’t be evil to someone unless you mean to be. It can always come back to haunt you.” –Kasi West

“Mean people can get ahead in life because nice people are afraid to turn them down.” –Sanhita Baruar

Mean Friends Quotes

  • “Don’t match their evil with evil. When people treat you badly, treat them with kindness. If you’re evil, you won’t lead a peaceful life. Ignore what they do to you. It’s better to treat them in a way they don’t see coming.” –Margaret Young

  • “Not giving people your attention doesn’t mean your upset with them. It means they aren’t worth the energy it takes to pay attention to them.” – Kate

  • “People who go out of their way to hurt you are looking for something that’s missing from their lives.” –Donald L. Hicks
  • “Try to be nice to people who aren’t nice to you. They may need it more than you think.” –Buddhism

  • “Sometimes it’s better to live in your own fantasy because in reality people can be worse than monsters. They try to ruin your soul and your happiness.” –J. Cornell Michel

  • “Your looks and skills don’t matter if the only thing people remember is your terrible attitude.”

  • “Mean people are getting too used to treating people badly. It’s time to put a stop to it. It’s time to show strength and kindness to overcome meanness.” –Scott Stabile

  • “No matter how bad someone’s life is, there’s never a reason to be mean to someone.” –Charles F. Glassman

  • "Unfortunately, there can be people who are more evil and cruel than you can imagine. Fortunately, there are people who can be nicer than you imagine.”

Mean Friends Quotes

  • “People who are envious of you take their anger out on you so they could feel like better people. Don’t give them the power to be able to do this to you.” –Nyki Mack

  •  “Try not to let mean people occupy space in your mental house. It’s time for them to get their things and move out of your mental house.” –Robert Tew
  • “The way people treat you will come back to them like a boomerang. The way you respond to it may also come back to you.” –Wayne Dyer

  • “People are mean when they don’t know how to be nice to people.” –Angela Panayotopulos

  • “Honesty doesn’t mean cruelty. You should tell the truth, but don’t be mean about it.” – by Elizabeth George

  • “People don’t decide on a whim that they are going to be bad people. It occurs when terrible things happen and they give in to the anger and it affects their inner peace.” –Robert Brault

“People can be evil regardless of what they are wearing or their status in the community. They can be just as evil and mean as they want to be. It makes them no different from wild animals. In fact, some can be worse than wild animals.” –Donna Lynn Hope

  • “Say the mean things you want to say to yourself. Repeat them several times and see how much it hurts you. If it does hurt you, then you know how your victims feel when you say those words to them. Think before you speak.” – by Rachel Eovacious

  • “Mean and evil people tend to take the fun out of life. Being around them is draining.” – by Thom Filicia

Mean Friends Quotes

As we close this exploration into the collection of mean friends quotes.

Remember that it's not about what others say, but how we choose to respond that truly matters.

Mean Friends Quotes

Author:

Larasati Natasha (intern)

scraped_articles.title: 8 Great Tourist Places In India For Beach Lovers
scraped_articles.meta_description: From the famous Goa to the breathtaking Lakshadweep islands, here are some of the best tourist places in India for beach lovers.
scraped_articles.meta_keywords: Tourist Places In India,Beach Destinations In India,Places To Visit In India
scraped_articles.content:
8 Great Tourist Places In India For Beach Lovers

8 Great Tourist Places In India For Beach Lovers

India is well known for its beautiful landscapes, rich history, and diverse culture. One of the key attractions of the country is its stunning beaches that stretch along the coastline. For tourists who love spending time by the sea, India has numerous tourist places that offer a perfect beach getaway.

As you explore the tourist places in India, you'll encounter a diverse array of beach spots suited to various tastes. Whether you seek tranquil and secluded shores or vibrant and bustling waterfronts, India offers a variety. The nation's beaches are knowned not just for their golden sands and clear waters, but also for the range of water sports and activities available.

In this article, we will take a tour around the best tourist places in India for beach lovers, according to various sources, Monday (19/2/2024).

So, pack your bags and get ready to embark on a beach adventure in incredible India.

1. Goa

Goa, known for its vibrant nightlife, stunning beaches, and Portuguese architecture, is a top destination for beach lovers. Whether you're looking to party the night away or simply relax on the sandy shores, Goa has something for every type of traveler.

Popular beaches like Baga, Calangute, and Anjuna offer a mix of water sports, beach shacks, and stunning views of the Arabian Sea. Don't miss the chance to explore the charming streets of Old Goa and sample some delicious Goan cuisine.

2. Andaman and Nicobar Islands

For those seeking a more secluded beach experience, the Andaman and Nicobar Islands are a must-visit destination. With pristine white sands, crystal-clear waters, and lush greenery, these islands offer a paradise-like setting for beach enthusiasts.

Radhanagar Beach on Havelock Island is often rated as one of the best beaches in Asia, thanks to its turquoise waters and breathtaking sunsets. Adventure seekers can also indulge in activities like snorkeling, scuba diving, and swimming with dolphins.

Located in Karnataka, Gokarna is a hidden gem for beach lovers looking for a more laid-back and spiritual beach experience. With its unspoiled beaches, tranquil atmosphere, and rustic beach huts, Gokarna is the perfect escape from the hustle and bustle of city life.

3. Gokarna

Om Beach, Kudle Beach, and Half Moon Beach are popular spots for relaxing, yoga retreats, and watching mesmerizing sunsets. Don't forget to explore the nearby temples and scenic trekking trails for a well-rounded experience.

4. Kovalam

Situated in Kerala, Kovalam is a charming beach town known for its crescent-shaped sandy beaches, lighthouses, and Ayurvedic wellness centers.

Lighthouse Beach, Hawa Beach, and Samudra Beach offer a mix of water activities, beachfront cafes, and stunning views of the Arabian Sea.

Kovalam is also a great place to learn about Kerala's rich culture and heritage through traditional dance performances, boat rides in the backwaters, and visits to nearby fishing villages.

Located on the southeastern coast of India, Pondicherry is a charming coastal town known for its French colonial architecture and vibrant culture.

5. Pondicherry

The town is home to several pristine beaches, such as Promenade Beach, Paradise Beach, and Auroville Beach, where you can relax in the sun, swim in the clear blue waters, or take part in water sports activities.

Pondicherry's unique blend of Indian and French influences makes it a perfect destination for beach lovers seeking a mix of relaxation and exploration.

6. Lakshadweep

Lakshadweep, a group of islands off the southwestern coast of India, is a tropical paradise with some of the most stunning beaches in the country.

With its crystal-clear waters, white sandy beaches, and vibrant marine life, Lakshadweep is a snorkeler's and diver's dream destination.

Agatti Island, Bangaram Island, and Kadmat Island are just a few of the islands in Lakshadweep where you can escape the hustle and bustle of city life and immerse yourself in the beauty of nature.

Situated in the northern part of Kerala, Kannur is a hidden gem for beach lovers looking for a peaceful and less crowded destination.

7. Kannur

The town is known for its serene beaches, such as Payyambalam Beach and Thottada Beach, where you can enjoy long walks on the golden sand, watch mesmerizing sunsets, and indulge in authentic Kerala cuisine.

Kerala cuisine. Kannur's laid-back atmosphere and warm hospitality make it a perfect beach destination for those seeking tranquility and relaxation.

8. Visakhapatnam

Visakhapatnam, often referred to as Vizag is a port city located on the eastern coast of India and is home to some of the most beautiful beaches in Andhra Pradesh.

Rushikonda Beach, Rama Krishna Beach, and Yarada Beach are popular among tourists for their soft sands, clear waters, and picturesque surroundings.

Visakhapatnam also offers a range of water sports activities, such as surfing, jet-skiing, and parasailing, making it a fun and adventurous destination for beach lovers of all ages.

scraped_articles.title: This Eyeless Shrimp Lives in an Underwater Volcano
scraped_articles.meta_description: This Eyeless Shrimp Lives in an Underwater Volcano
scraped_articles.content:
This Eyeless Shrimp Lives in an Underwater Volcano

This Eyeless Shrimp Lives in an Underwater Volcano

Some deep-sea shrimp, believed to be blind, travel great distances to reach their home — a boiling hot abyss at the bottom of the ocean with zero sunlight that's to most other life.

Marine scientist Heather Bracken-Grissom — along with Tamara Frank, professor at Nova Southeastern University, Sönke Johnsen, full professor at Duke University, and Jon Cohen, associate professor at the University of Delaware — hopes to uncover the secrets of these strange shrimp.

With a $1.35 million National Science Foundation (NSF) grant, the team will use advanced technology. It's a case of descending to the crushing pressure of the sea floor where the shrimp live.

Then, could you investigate them and their environment? Alvinocaridid ten-footed shrimp, or vent shrimp, swarm to the ocean’s thermal vents.

Discovered in 1977 and sparsely scattered across mid-ocean ridges, the vents resemble tall chimney-like structures that spew clouds of toxic chemicals reaching upward of 700 degrees.

Some species of vent shrimp crowd together in the thousands on the sides of these vents, forming patches of ghostly white. It’s the equivalent of living on the side of a volcano. But vent shrimp aren’t aren'there. As larvae, they can live 300 to 3,000 feet away from the hydrothermal vents.

"There's a lot of mysteries surrounding these shrimps, like how do they even find the vents,” Bracken-Grissom said.

"Is vision involved in the detection over short distances, and once there, how are they so successful? We'll hopefully be able to answer some of these questions."

When vent shrimp were first discovered in the 1980s, it's been thought they were blind.

Some species don't have typical eyes but a structure that appears like large white wings on their back — later discovered to be a huge dorsal-fused eye. Other studies, though, concluded these were non-functional.

The current team is still determining. Previous vent shrimp were collected under the bright lights of a submersible, probably too harsh for the shrimps' sensitive eyes, rendering them blind.

So first, the researchers will examine the visual systems of the vent shrimp to determine if they are blind or not. Then, they want to understand if the fused eyes sense light to locate the vents.

"I've been wanting to work on these shrimp ever since I read the papers from 30 years ago that suggested they had non-functional eyes," said Frank, the lead PI at Nova Southeastern University. "I just can't understand how they could undergo such a massive metamorphosis from stalked juvenile eyes to huge dorsal adult eyes to produce a non-functional eye."

Another objective of this project is to search for new bioluminescence sources around hydrothermal vent systems, which have never been documented.

Researchers will rely on a remote-operated vehicle (ROV) that can be controlled from the ship to reach the vents and explore the shrimp and bioluminescence.

Essentially a giant robot, the ROV will collect samples and high-resolution video, using unique methods the team has developed over the decades to gather deep-sea species without blinding them."

“This is a lifelong dream of mine to study these habitats. Since I was in grad school and learned about these weird, blind shrimp at the vents, I wanted to study the,” Bracken-Grissom said.

“Now, here I am, all these years later — and I’m actually going to do i."

scraped_articles.title: 6 Haunted Places in Mumbai That Will Scare The Devil Inside You
scraped_articles.meta_description: Are you ready to unlock the secrets that linger in the mystical paths of Mumbai?
scraped_articles.content:
6 Haunted Places in Mumbai That Will Scare The Devil Inside You

Mumbai is a significant and lively city with busy streets and vibrant neighborhoods. Mumbai has another side—a mysterious and spooky one.

6 Haunted Places in Mumbai That Will Scare The Devil Inside You

Behind the shiny buildings and crowded places are stories of ghosts and hauntings. Get ready for a journey into the creepy parts of Mumbai, where old stories and strange happenings still linger. These aren't just regular spots; they're places where spooky things might make you feel scared. Join us as we explore six haunted places in Mumbai. Their spooky tales will give you goosebumps and make the little devil inside you wake up. It is about the mysterious side of Mumbai, where even the bravest might feel a little scared. Let's dive into the ghostly stories of Maximum City.

1. Mukesh Mills: Where Shadows Whisper the Past

Nestled in Colaba, Mumbai, Mukesh Mills is a chilling testament to a dark history.

Ruined by fire in 1870, this 150-year-old mill has been shrouded in ghostly tales.

Charcoal-lined ruins, walls overgrown with creepers, and lonely pathways echo dead workers' cries. Film crews, too, have encountered frightening reports. Some unexplainable experiences add an extra layer of mystery to Mukesh Mills, one of the most haunted places in Mumbai.

Haunted Places in Mumbai

flickr/Pankaj Kumar

2. D’Souza Chawl: A Tragic Tale Echoing Through Time

In Santa Cruz East, Mumbai, the haunting echoes of D’Souza Chawl linger. Decades ago, a tragic incident spread when a woman accidentally fell into a well.

This case casts a spectral shadow over the chawl. Eyewitness reports and chilling stories show her unwilling spirit roaming the complex.

As the sun sets, residents prefer the safety of their homes. They avoid the ghostly presence that has made D’Souza Chawl a supernatural enigma.

Haunted Places in Mumbai

Andheri East holds the mysterious St John Baptist Church, a site draped in ghostly tales.

3. St John Baptist Church: A Sanctuary of Spirits

Before 1977, locals spoke of a young bride's spirit haunting the church premises. It provoked calls for an exorcism.

Among Mumbai's top 10 haunted places, the church hosts a Christmas mass yearly. For the rest of the year, locals stay away from the church, keeping it mysterious.

Haunted Places in Mumbai

4. The Tower of Silence: Where Spirits Ascend Amidst Silence

Perched in the Malabar Hills, the Tower of Silence is a Parsi burial ground.

This tower holds secrets whispered by the wind. Here, vultures once consumed the deceased before their journey to the afterlife.

Visitors report glimpses of white ghosts and spooky shrills echoing through the night. Some also feel unexplained shivers coursing through those who tread this haunted ground.

Haunted Places in Mumbai

5. Mumbai High Court: Ghostly Justice Unveiled

In the heart of Church Gate, the Mumbai High Court unveils a spectral side to justice.

Here, a ghost is said to assist lawyers, intimidating convicts into confessing their crimes.

The looming Gothic structure of this 18th-century court adds to the intrigue, as ghostly tales weave a supernatural presence within these hallowed halls.

Haunted Places in Mumbai

6. Nasserwanj Wadi: A Spirit's Restless Journey

Near Mahim Station, Nasserwanj Wadi whispers a gruesome tale of murder and restless spirits. About a decade ago, Nasser met a brutal end. Since then, locals claim to see his spirit wandering, especially near the well where his body was dumped. The ghost turns aggressive if blocked, with some even reporting possession of the past landlord's vengeful presence.

As darkness descends, these haunted places in Mumbai invite the brave to step into the shadows. These spots are where the past and the paranormal twist.

These tales create a ghostly tapestry of unexplained mysteries. Are you ready to unlock the secrets that linger in the mystical paths of Maximum City?

Haunted Places in Mumbai

scraped_articles.title: 55 Toxic Relationship Quotes to Speak to the Silent Struggles of Unhealthy Love
scraped_articles.meta_description: These toxic relationship quotes act like mirrors and lights. They show us the tough times many people go through.
scraped_articles.content:
55 Toxic Relationship Quotes to Speak to the Silent Struggles of Unhealthy Love

55 Toxic Relationship Quotes to Speak to the Silent Struggles of Unhealthy Love

Love paints a picture full of ups and downs in the world of feelings. Love can be a confusing labyrinth. It is where feelings get twisted, and hearts go on a rollercoaster ride. But sometimes, there's a calm struggle in love that we don't talk much about—the tough times in relationships that make us feel stuck.

To understand these ups and downs, we're turning to simple words—toxic relationship quotes that capture the tough side of love. Come along as we explore toxic relationship quotes. It is about unhealthy connections, speaking to the not-so-happy parts of love that many of us go through.

1. “The only way out of a toxic relationship is to recognize that it is toxic and make the choice to leave.”

2. “Toxic relationships are like poison; they slowly but surely eat away at your sanity and emotional wellbeing.”

3. “A toxic relationship will transpose your insecurities onto you until you no longer recognize yourself.”

4. “Don’t light yourself on fire trying to brighten someone else’s existence.” ― Charlotte Eriksson

5. “While it may feel scary to be alone again, it may be even scarier to stay.”

6. “Toxic relationships are like a good pasta that has been overcooked.” ― Asa Don Brown

Toxic Relationship Quotes

7. “Toxic relationships can leave you feeling drained, both physically and emotionally.”

8. “You make me feel like a firefly. Trapped in a bell jar; starved for love.” ― Ayushee Ghoshal

9. "If they are not making you glow, glow alone."

10. "We should fight for our relationships, but if fighting means ripping yourself to shreds and piggybacking all his demons, you need to leave." – Tara Love

11. “We should fight for our relationships, but if fighting means ripping yourself to shreds and piggybacking all his demons, you need to leave.” ― Tara Love

12. “Love cannot live where there is no trust.” — Edith Hamilton

Toxic Relationship Quotes

13. “A toxic relationship is like a slow-acting poison; it will eventually kill you if you don’t recognize it and take steps to get out of it.”

14. “Stop setting yourself on fire to keep someone else warm.”

15. “Love should not make you feel like walking on eggshells.”― Emma Xu

16. “I mean, if the relationship can’t survive the long term, why on earth would it be worth my time and energy for the short term.” ― Nicholas Sparks

17. “Toxic relationships can cause deep psychological and emotional damage that may take years to heal.”

18. “A bad relationship can do that, can make you doubt everything good you ever felt about yourself.” ― Dionne Warwick

19. “If you’re in a relationship and all you do is cry, you need to stop and ask yourself, are you dating a human or an onion?” ― Karen Salmansohn

20. “The longer you stay in a toxic relationship, the more it will chip away at your sense of self-worth and happiness.”

21. “You don’t let go of a bad relationship because you stop caring about them. You let go because you start caring about yourself.”– Charles Orlando

22. “A bad relationship is like standing on broken glass, if you stay you will keep hurting. If you walk away, you will hurt but eventually, you will heal.” ― Autumn Kohler

23. “Toxic relationships are like a disease; they spread if not contained or treated.”

24. “Sometimes there are things in life that aren’t meant to stay. Sometimes change may not be what we want. Sometimes change is what we need.” — Don Bolena Jr.

Toxic Relationship Quotes

25. “Just because someone desires you, does not mean that he values you.”—Julianne Cantarella

26. “A toxic relationship keeps dragging you down. It never helps you in becoming better.”

27. “Toxic relationships will never bring out the best in you; they will only drag you down and make you feel worthless.”

28. “A good relationship is when someone accepts your past, supports your present and encourages your future.” ― Karen Salmansohn

29. “No partner in a love relationship… should feel that he has to give up an essential part of himself to make it viable.” ― May Sarton

30. “Toxic relationships are like a game of tug-of-war; always with one person pulling harder than the other.”

31. “Toxic relationships can be like a black hole; they suck away your energy until all that’s left is darkness.”

32. “Fire False Friends as early as possible. Do it before they dig out the dream seeds you’ve planted! The earlier, the better; the quicker, the safer!” ― Israelmore Ayivor

33. “The only way to survive a toxic relationship is to recognize it for what it is and take steps to end it.”

34. “No matter how hard you try to make it work, a toxic relationship will never bring out the best in you.”

Toxic Relationship Quotes

35. “Forgiveness is a personal process that doesn’t depend on us having direct contact with the people who have hurt us.” ― Sharon Salzberg

36. “Dear Self: Stop re-opening your doors for toxic people, then calling it ‘seeking closure.’ Certain things don’t work out in life . . . and that’s ok.” — Reyna Biddy

37. “It is better for someone to break your heart once by leaving your life, than for them to stay in your life and break your heart continually.”–Terry Mark

38. “Never let someone who contributes so little to a relationship control so much of it.”

39. “You cannot thrive in toxic relationships.”

40. “Your time is limited, so don't waste it living someone else's life.” – Steve Jobs

41. “Don’t allow someone not worth it to have the power to occupy your thoughts.” ― Donna Lynn Hope

42. “Toxic relationships have been known to end friendships, ruin families, and destroy careers.”

Toxic Relationship Quotes

43. “A toxic relationship cannot be fixed; sometimes the only way out is to end it and start again.”

44. “Don’t settle for a relationship that won’t let you be yourself.” ― Oprah Winfrey

45. “Accepting toxicity in any form is like accepting poison; it will eventually kill you.”

46. “Emotional abuse can be just as damaging as physical abuse; sometimes even more so.”

47. “Toxic relationships are never healthy; they only make you feel worthless and drained of energy.

Toxic Relationship Quotes

48. “I seem to be torn between ‘I wish we’d met earlier’ and ‘I wish we’d never met’.” ― Ahmed Mostafa

49. “You cannot thrive in toxic relationships.”

50. “The one who loves the least, controls the relationship.” – Robert Anthony

51. “The first step to getting out of a toxic relationship is recognizing it for what it truly is.”

52. “Sometimes you need to give up on people, not because you don’t care but because they don’t.”

53. “The longer you stay in a toxic relationship, the more it will damage your mental and emotional wellbeing.”

54. “The best thing you can do for yourself when in a toxic relationship is to get out as soon as possible.”

55. “Toxic relationships can have an insidious way of slowly eroding your sense of self-worth and happiness.”

These toxic relationship quotes act like mirrors and lights. They show us the tough times many people go through, letting us know it's okay to feel that way. As we finish this journey, let these words stay with you—not just as quotes but as reminders.

May these toxic relationship quotes strengthen those dealing with tricky relationships. May it motivate everyone to find a way out. By understanding the challenging parts, we can make room for healthier connections. Let's discover the beauty of loving ourselves and others in a better way.

5 Movies About Mental Hospital to Make You Feel the Dark Side of Asylums

Mental hospitals, also known as asylums, have long been a subject of fascination and fear in favored cultures.

These institutions are often depicted in movies as dark and sinister places. It is where patients are mistreated and subjected to inhumane conditions.

If you want to explore the dark side of asylums through film, this list is suited for you. Here are five movies about mental hospitals that will leave you feeling haunted.






Movies About Mental Hospital

  • Genre: Thriller/Mystery
  • IMDb: 8,2/10
  • Google Users: 89%

One movie that delves into the eerie world of mental hospitals is "Shutter Island" (2010).

1. Shutter Island (2010)

Directed by Martin Scorsese, this psychological thriller follows a U.S. Marshal who investigates the disappearance of a patient at a remote mental institution. You can watch "Shutter Island" on streaming platforms like Netflix or Amazon Prime.

IMDb

2. Gonjiam: Haunted Asylum (2018)

  • Genre: Horror/Mystery
  • IMDb: 6,4/10
  • Rotten Tomatoes: 92%

For those who enjoy horror films, "Gonjiam: Haunted Asylum" (2018) is a South Korean found-footage horror movie.

It is set in an abandoned psychiatric hospital. The film follows a group of YouTubers as they explore the haunted asylum and encounter terrifying supernatural events.

It can be streamed on Amazon Prime or YouTube platforms.

3. Stonehearst Asylum (2014)

  • Genre: Horror/Mystery
  • IMDb: 6,8/10
  • Google Users: 80%

If you're interested in a period piece set in a mental hospital, "Stonehearst Asylum" (2014) is the movie for you. Starring Kate Beckinsale and Jim Sturgess, this gothic thriller follows a young doctor.

She uncovers dark secrets at a remote asylum. You can watch it on Hulu or Google Play Movies.

4. One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest (1975)

  • Genre: Drama/Comedy
  • IMDb: 8,7/10
  • Rotten Tomatoes: 93%

"One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest" is considered a classic in the genre. It is a drama set in a mental hospital where patients rebel against oppressive authority.

Starring Jack Nicholson, it sheds light on the harsh realities of life inside an asylum. Watch it on Netflix or Amazon Prime.

IMDb

5. Quills (2000)

  • Genre: Drama
  • IMDb: 7,2/10
  • Rotten Tomatoes: 75%

Lastly, "Quills" (2000) is a historical drama. It explores the life of the infamous Marquis de Sade during his time in an insane asylum.

Starring Geoffrey Rush and Kate Winslet, this film delves into themes of censorship, madness, and freedom of expression. You can watch it on platforms like Hulu or YouTube.

These five movies about mental hospitals show a glimpse into the dark and twisted world of asylums. It is where patients are often misunderstood and mistreated.

Whether you're a fan of psychological thrillers, horror films, or period pieces, these movies will leave you feeling haunted long after the credits roll.

Let's, grab some popcorn and turn off the lights. Let's prepare to explore the dark side of mental hospitals through these gripping and unsettling films.
