scraped_articles.content:
40 Questions To Ask At The End Of An Interview For A Teaching Assistant Position

The interview room is a realm of pressure and opportunity. It is where your journey toward a teaching assistant position finds its moment of truth. As the conversation closes with its decision, a chance arises that can often make a lasting image – the opportunity to ask questions at the end of an interview.

40 Questions To Ask At The End Of An Interview For A Teaching Assistant Position

The interviewer may have questioned your qualifications, experiences, and teaching philosophy. Your questions can reveal your interest, curiosity, and willingness to contribute. Preparing questions to ask at the end of an interview is a formality. It is also a strategic way to show your readiness and employ dialogue. Your answer and question look resonate with the essence of your desired role.

In the closing moments of the interview, your questions focused on your dedication to the teaching profession. The primary purpose of your questions is to gain valuable insights. It's also a chance to showcase your commitment to continuous growth and development. By seeking to understand the institution's path to professional development, curriculum innovation, and strategies for education. You can communicate your enthusiasm to grow in the ever-changing education.

Your questions are more than investigations. Learn these questions to ask at the end of an interview to tell your aspirations. This will help you to become an integral part of education. Ask about team dynamics, interdisciplinary industries, and options to contribute to extracurricular activities.

You signal your readiness to collaborate beyond the classroom. This enthusiasm engages with teachers and promotes a holistic learning environment. It is proof of your dedication to boosting the growth of young minds.

Becoming a vital part of a school's education, remember that the questions you ask carry as much importance as the answers you provide. They represent your preparation, aspirations, and vision for the desired role.

You can transform the interview's closure into an educational journey through brilliant questions. Here are some questions to ask at the end of an interview idea, as compiled from numerous sources, Tuesday (29/08/2023).

Questions To Ask At The End Of An Interview

1. Can you tell me about the school’s approach to behaviour management?

 2. Does your school encourage the teaching assistant staff to undergo further training?

 3. What is the management structure of the teaching team?

 4. What is the most important part of a teaching assistant role at this school?

 5. How will my performance be assessed and reviewed?

 6. What does a typical day look like for a teaching assistant at your school?

7. What systems are in place to deal with student discipline?

8. How would you describe the school ethos?

9. What do other teachers/teaching assistants like the most about this school?

10. What are the main things the school wishes to improve, and how would I be able to help?

Photo: pexels-edmond-dantès

Questions To Ask At The End Of An Interview

11. What are the main challenges the school faces?

 12. Do you think that I would be a suitable teaching assistant for your school?

13. What resources are available to me to help support students?

14. How can i-teachers help you to become a teaching assistant?

 15. May I tell you a little more about my interest in (your job relevant interest)?

16. How often will I be required to work one-on-one with students?

 17. Can you tell me about your school’s approach to parent engagement?

18. What qualities are you looking for in a successful candidate?

 19. Are there any plans to change the structure of support staff within the school in the near future?

 20. What type of training will I receive before starting my role? 

Photo: pexels-gustavo-fring-

Questions To Ask At The End Of An Interview

21. Tell us about a time you worked effectively with children.

 22. Will there be opportunities to teach classes or lead projects?

 23. What extra-curricular opportunities are available for students?

 24. How will I be evaluated and supported in my professional development?

 25. What challenges do you feel this school faces and how are they being addressed?

26. How does this school support students with special educational needs and/or disabilities (SEND)? 

27. What is the average class size?

28. How do you think this role will develop over time?

 29. What funding is available for classroom resources and professional development opportunities?

 30. What are the school’s priorities when it comes to student achievement?

31. What type of support will I receive from the teacher I am working with?

 32. Can you tell me about opportunities for career progression within the school?

33. What experience do you think is necessary for this role?

34. What is the school’s approach to dealing with difficult behaviour?

 35. What kind of feedback will I receive about my performance in this role?

36. What is the teacher-to-student ratio in this school?

37. What are the school’s policies on pupil progress and target setting?

 38. What are the school’s policies on classroom management?

 39. What does a typical day involve for a teaching assistant in this school?

 40. Can you tell me more about the students I’ll be working with?

As for the teaching assistant interview, the final act is a conclusion. The questions you choose to pose in these closing moments hold power. These will leave a lasting impact. Also, it shapes how you're remembered in the interviewer's mind.
You've showcased your qualifications and passion throughout the conversation. Your questions now offer a glimpse into your interest, vision, and design with educational values.
Photo: pexels-tima-miroshnichenko-

As you journey home, remember that your questions are integral to the interview.

 They show your brilliant review of the role, your enthusiasm for contributing, and your readiness to embrace the responsibilities of a teaching assistant. The interview room is a platform for mutual exploration.

Through your questions, you elevate the conversation beyond the very formalities. This moment leaves an unforgettable mark on the moment. Plus, it points toward a bright future in education.

scraped_articles.title: 7 How To Survive In The Desert Without Water: Essential Survival Tips
scraped_articles.meta_description: Surviving in the desert is a challenging test of your strength. Following these survival tips can increase your chances of staying alive until help comes.
scraped_articles.content:
7 How To Survive In The Desert Without Water: Essential Survival Tips

7 How To Survive In The Desert Without Water: Essential Survival Tips

Surviving in the desert without water is a fearsome challenge.

The harsh and dry environment can quickly lead to dehydration and heat-related illnesses. But, with the right knowledge and strategies, you can raise your chances of staying alive until help comes. In this article, we will explore seven essential survival tips on how to survive in the desert. We will highlight the importance of saving energy and finding resources while awaiting rescue.
Let's check out some tips on how to survive in the desert, compiled from numerous sources, Thursday (07/09/2023).

Photo: sergey-pesterev-unsplash

1. Cover Your Head in the Desert

One of the first things you should do when lost in the desert is to protect yourself from the burning sun. The desert sun can be unfeeling; prolonged exposure can lead to sunburn and heatstroke. Use any available clothing or materials to create a makeshift hat or head covering. This will provide shade and help control your body temperature.

2. Stay Hungry — Avoid Eating in the desert

It may seem absurd, but saving energy is more critical than fulfilling hunger when lost in the desert. Eating can boost your metabolic rate, causing your body to produce more heat. This will also use precious water for digestion. It's best to give up any and focus on staying hydrated.
Photo: pexels-noureddine-belfethi-

In a desert survival situation, every drop of sweat counts. Your body's natural cooling mechanism is through sweating. But extreme sweating can lead to fast dehydration. Remember to move slowly in the desert. To save sweat, avoid extra physical activity during the hotter parts of the day. You can rest in the shade when possible.

3. Keep Sweat, Not Water

Photo: pexels-isa-sebastião

4. Use Urine to Dampen Clothes - Do Not Drink Your Urine

While drinking your urine is a common myth in survival situations, it's not well. Urine is concentrated waste and can worsen dehydration. Instead, you can use a small amount of urine to dampen your clothing. As the water evaporates, it will provide a cooling effect. This also helps keep your body temperature down.

5. Keep Your Clothes On

Your clothing is a barrier between your skin and the sun's extremes. Wear long sleeves and pants to protect your skin from direct sunlight. Covering up also reduces the risk of sunburn. Keeping your clothes on also minimizes water loss through sweat evaporation.

Being visible to potential rescuers is crucial when lost in the desert. Use reflective objects or brightly colored clothing to signal for help. If you have a mirror or any shiny material, use it to create light flashes. It can catch the attention of passing aircraft or remote search groups.

6. Try to Attract Attention

7. Be Prepared to Make a Fire

While keeping a fire in the desert can be challenging due to limited fuel sources, it's a helpful survival skill. Fires provide warmth during cold desert nights and can be used for signaling. Carry fire-starting tools like waterproof matches or a fire starter kit in your survival gear.

Photo: pixabay/8moments

Surviving in the desert without water is a challenging test of your strength and creativity. Following these essential survival tips can increase your chances of staying alive until help comes. Remember to prioritize staying cool, saving moisture, and signaling for rescue. The desert is a harsh territory, but you can overcome its challenges and survive with the right knowledge and preparedness.

scraped_articles.title: 5 Most Popular Vietnamese Snacks to Give You Tasteful Experiences
scraped_articles.meta_description: These offer a sensory journey that captures Vietnamese snacks' rich flavors and cultural variety. Each snack carries a unique essence.
scraped_articles.meta_keywords: Vietnamese snacks,Vietnamese Street Food,Vietnam,Vietnamese foods,asia,South Asian,asian traveler,Asian Food,Most Popular Asian Noodle Dishes,Traditional Foods,Food,travel news,amazing traveler,Traveling around the world
scraped_articles.content:
5 Most Popular Vietnamese Snacks to Give You Tasteful Experiences

5 Most Popular Vietnamese Snacks to Give You Tasteful Experiences

Vietnamese cuisine is famous for its intricate flavors and rich ingredients; its snack offerings are no exception. It ranges from savory to sweet.

Vietnamese snacks are the essence of the country's culinary heritage. In this article, we take a delicious journey to discover the top 5 most popular Vietnamese snacks. These promise to tantalize your taste buds. They also offer a delightful glimpse into Vietnamese cuisine.

Vietnamese steamed buns, known as "Bánh bao." Steamed buns are fluffy pockets of goodness. These are filled with various savory or sweet fillings.

1. Vietnamese Steamed Buns (Bánh bao)

The soft, slightly sweet bun exterior perfectly contrasts with the flavorful fillings. The fillings can include minced pork, chicken, vegetables, and sometimes even hard-boiled eggs.

Their popularity lies in their versatility and lovely nature, making them a beloved snack for people of all ages.

Photo: flickr/Kirk K

2. Sugared or Salted Fruit (Ô mai)



 "Ô mai" is a traditional Vietnamese treat that transforms fruits into refreshing snacks. The fruits are often plums, apricots, or kumquats.

Photo: hanoi-online.

Ô mai are preserved through a process of sugaring or salting. The result is a harmonious balance between sweet and tangy flavors, creating a unique taste experience. Ô mai's popularity is attributed to its delightful contrast. Plus, it keeps the essence of fresh fruits in every bite.

Photo: pixabay/Leohoho

Nem nướng or Vietnamese grilled pork sausage. It is a savory snack that captures the rich flavors of Vietnamese street food culture.

3. Vietnamese Grilled Pork Sausage (Nem nướng)  Photo:

Minced pork is seasoned with a blend of spices and grilled to perfection. Nem nướng is often served with rice paper, fresh herbs, and a dipping sauce. Its popularity is rooted in the smoky aroma of the grilled meat. Plus, the interactive experience of making your own rolls.



Photo: youtube/Cô Ba Bình Dương

4. Vietnamese Summer Rolls (Gỏi cuốn)



 Gỏi cuốn is also known as Vietnamese summer rolls. This snack is fresh, healthy, and bursting with rich flavors. These sheer rice paper rolls are typically filled with shrimp, herbs, rice vermicelli, and sometimes pork or tofu.

Photo: pinterest/Hanna le

The popularity of summer rolls stems from their refreshing nature. Gỏi cuốn is ideal for hot weather—the combination of textures and the dipping sauce, often peanut or hoisin-based. The sauce adds to the luxury and flavor.



 Photo: pixabay/sontung57

5. Vietnamese Fried Spring Rolls (Chả giò)

 Chả giò or Vietnamese fried spring rolls. These are classic snacks with a satisfying crunch—a mixture of minced pork, vegetables, and sometimes seafood.

Chả giò is wrapped in rice paper and deep-fried to a crispy golden brown. These rolls are often served with fresh lettuce, herbs, and a dipping sauce. 

The popularity of chả giò lies in the contrast between the crispy exterior and the flavorful, tender interior.


 Photo: flickr/hannahbanana16

Popular Vietnamese Snacks

Take a culinary adventure through the top 5 most popular Vietnamese snacks. They offer a sensory journey that captures Vietnamese snacks' rich flavors and cultural variety. It ranges from grilled pork's savory charm to summer rolls' refreshing nature. Each snack carries a unique essence that speaks to the heart of Vietnamese cooking. Do you want to savor the sweetness of sugared fruits or enjoy the satisfying crunch of fried spring rolls? These Vietnamese snacks promise to leave you with tasteful experiences. They will stay in your memory and palate for years to come.

scraped_articles.title: 60 Winter Jokes to Warm Your Heart on Cold Days
scraped_articles.meta_description: These super hilarious winter jokes will fill the cold days with a lot of laughter and warm your body and heart.
scraped_articles.content:
60 Winter Jokes to Warm Your Heart on Cold Days

60 Winter Jokes to Warm Your Heart on Cold Days

Winter is a magical time of year, full of snowflakes, hot cocoa, and cozy nights by the fire. But, as the days get colder, we all need a little extra cheer to keep our spirits warm. That's where winter jokes come in! These lighthearted jokes can bring a smile to anyone's face, no matter how chilly it gets outside.

Whether you're sitting by the fireplace with family or having fun with friends on a snowy day, winter jokes are a great way to share laughter and joy. They can turn a cold, gloomy day into a fun and memorable one, making everyone feel a bit warmer inside.

In this article, we have selected some of the best winter jokes ever from various sources, Monday (22/7/2024).

These lighthearted jokes will warm your heart, even during the coldest day of the winter.

A. The Best Winter Jokes for Everyone

1. What happens when a mosquito lands on a snowman? He gets frostbite.

2. Why did the snowman hold up his arms? He was told to freeze.

3. What happens when you catch a cold? You get cabin fever.

4. How does Jack Frost keep warm? With a thick blanket of snow.

5. When is an igloo a bad investment? During global warming.

6. How did the snowman get flattened? Instead of his usual snow shower, he went for an avalanche.

7. What has the best chance of surviving a fall? Snow.

8. What often falls at the North Pole but never gets hurt? Snow.

9. How do snowmen read their texts? With an icy stare.

10. Which one is faster: hot or cold? Hot. You can catch a cold.

11. What do you get when you mix a snowman with a vampire? Frostbite.

12. How do snowmen buy birthday presents? With cold, hard cash.

13. What do you call a snowman's temper tantrum? A meltdown.

14. Why did the two snowmen divorce? One thought the other was a flake.

15. What can you catch in the winter, even with your eyes closed? A cold.

16. What do snow parents call their kids? Chill-dren.

17. Where does a snowman get the weather report? The winternet.

18. Why did the husband pour warm water on his computer? He had asked his wife what to do if windows froze.

19. Why was the king penguin's wife so misunderstood? She was a total ice queen.

20. If a winter fox lost his tail, where would you go to buy him a new one? A retail store.

21. What's the best way to scare a snowman? Talk about global warming.

22. How do you get a snow monster to go away? Get into a heated argument.

23. What do you call it when a snowman ignores you? The cold shoulder.

24. Why didn't the whistleblower go outside during the winter? He was Snowden.

25. What does a Starbucks employee's job title change to in winter? A brrrr-ista!

B. Funny Winter Jokes for Kids

1. What do snowmen eat for lunch? Icebergers.

2. What kind of ball doesn't bounce? A snowball.

3. How do polar bears make their beds? With sheets of ice and blankets of snow.

4. What does Frosty's mom put on her face at night? Cold cream.

5. What sort of cakes do snowmen like? Any cake with lots of icing.

6. What do you call a snowman that tells tall tales? A snow-fake!

7. What do you call a cold thief? A brrrr-glar.

8. Why are polar bears so big? Because they snack on ice cream and snow cones.

9. Why did Princess Elsa fall off her sled? She let it go.

10. Why do birds fly south for the winter? Because it's too far to walk.

11. What is the best breakfast cereal to eat in the winter? Frosted flakes.

12. What do snowmen win at the Olympics? Cold medals!

13. Where do snowmen put their money? In snow banks.

14. Who were the snowman's parents? Mom and popsicle!

15. What do you call a penguin in the Sahara Desert? Lost.

C. More Hilarious Winter Jokes

1. What do mountains wear to stay warm? Snowcaps.

2. What did the police officer say when he saw the snowman stealing? Freeze!

3. Why did the snowman go to the doctor? He was getting chills.

4. What does the snowman take when he's worried about melting? A chill pill.

5. What do you call a prom in the North Pole? A snow ball.

6. What happened when an icicle landed on the girl's head? It knocked her out cold!

7. What do you call an elderly snowman? Water.

8. Why don't you see penguins in Britain? They're afraid of Wales.

9. What do you call a snowman on rollerblades? A snowmobile.

10. Why did the bear keep getting fired? He always disappeared in the winter.

11. What is a snowman's favorite snack? Ice Krispies treats.

12. What did the investigator say to the snowman? Icy right through your lies.

13. Why was there a puddle in front of the fireplace? A snowman was trying to warm himself.

14. What is the best way to build a snow fort? I-gloo it together.

15. Who is Frosty's favorite aunt? Aunt Artica.

16. When does winter begin? When autumn leaves.

17. What do snowmen get at a Mexican restaurant? Brrrr-itos.

18. Why should you invite an ice fisherman to your party? To help break the ice.

19. Why did the orchestra set up in the snow? They wanted to play cool jazz.

20. What did the tree say after a long, cold winter? What a re-leaf!

scraped_articles.title: 66 Spring Quotes Funny for Welcoming the Season of Renewal
scraped_articles.meta_description: Spring is often called nature's grandest stimulation. These spring quotes are formulated with the energy of humor.
scraped_articles.content:
66 Spring Quotes Funny for Welcoming the Season of Renewal

The last traces of winter's cold slowly melt away. Nature prepares to unveil its beautiful transformation—the coming of spring. This season of renewal is like a painter's canvas. It is splashed with rich hues and sprinkled with new beginnings.

66 Spring Quotes Funny for Welcoming the Season of Renewal

What better way to embrace the blossoming than with hearty laughter? Enter the world of spring quotes funny, where humor dances hand in hand—also their delicate petals and fresh fragrances of this refreshing time of year.

Spring is often called nature's grandest stimulation. It is the canvas upon which fancy and wonder blend. This very spirit finds its home in the realm of humorous spring quotes—those witty and playful lines that pat our funny bones.

Here are some funny spring quotes compiled from numerous sources, Thursday (10/08/2023). pexels-alena-koval

Spring Quotes Funny to Make You Smile

1. “Spring is the only revolutionary whose revolution has succeeded.” – Marianne Van Hirtum

2. “Spring beckons! All things to the call respond; the trees are leaving and cashiers abscond.” – Ambrose Bierce

3. "Winter left me with a few spring rolls."

4. "I have completely pollen in love with this time of year."

5. “Spring makes its own statement, so loud and clear that the gardener seems to be only one of the instruments, not the composer.” – Geoffrey B. Charlesworth

6. "Spring is here. Turn over a new leaf. Time to turn a new leaf."

Spring Quotes

7. “Spring is when you feel like whistling, even with a shoe full of slush.” – Doug Larson

8. "It’s a lovely shade of pollen outside. Spring has sprung. It’s finally spring thyme."

9. “Spring is the time of the year, when it is summer in the sun and winter in the shade.” – Charles Dickens

10. "If Winter comes, can Spring be far behind?" - Percy Bysshe Shelley

11. "Spring is when life's alive in everything." — Christina Rossetti

Spring Quotes Funny That Will Make You Chuckle

12. "To thrive in life you need three bones. A wishbone. A backbone. And a funny bone." — Reba McEntire

13. "Winter is on my head, but eternal spring is in my heart." — Victor Hugo

14. "Despite the forecast, live like it's Spring." — Lilly Pulitzer

pixabay_ValeriaLu

15. "When spring came, even the false spring, there were no problems except where to be happiest." — Ernest Hemingway

16. "Unfortunately there is nothing more inane than an Easter carol. It is a religious perversion of the activity of Spring in our blood." — Wallace Stevens7

17. "If God wanted football played in the spring, he would not have invented baseball." — Sam Rutigliano

18. "Isn't it funny how day by day nothing changes, but when you look back everything is different." — C. S. Lewis

19. "Autumn is a second spring where every leaf is a flower." — Albert Camus

20. "It's not Spring Break until somebody dies!
— Daniel Tosh

21. "Science has never drummed up quite as effective a tranquilizing agent as a sunny spring day." — Wilton E. Hall
pixabay_JillWellington

22. "The clocks are all turned forward from Funny Time to Right Time. I always remember, "Spring back or Fall in." — Dave Beard

pixabay_likesilkto

Spring Quotes Funny That Will Have You Laughing

23. "I'd like to sing you a song now about my old girlfriend. It's called "They'll Find Her When the Leaves Blow Away 'Cause I'm Not Raking 'Til Spring." — Steven Wright

24. “A little Madness in the Spring Is wholesome even for the King.” – Emily Dickinson

25. “In the spring, at the end of the day, you should smell like dirt.” – Margaret Atwood

26. “A man has every season while a woman only has the right to spring.” – Jane Fonda

28. “Despite the forecast, live like it’s Spring.”- Lilly Pulitzer

29. "In the Spring, I have counted 136 different kinds of weather inside of 24 hours." - Mark Twain

30. “Spring makes its own statement, so loud and clear that the gardener seems to be only one of the instruments, not the composer.” – Geoffrey B. Charlesworth
pixabay

31. “Spring is the time of the year, when it is summer in the sun and winter in the shade.” – Charles Dickens

32. “Walk lightly in the spring; Mother Earth is pregnant.” – Native American Indian Proverb (Kiowa)

33. "Spring is when you feel like whistling even with a shoe full of slush." - Doug Larson
joel-holland-unsplash

Spring Quotes Funny to Make You Giggle

34. "Spring is nature's way of saying, 'Let's party!' - Robin Williams

35. "I am totally a spring chicken."

36. “A life without love is like a year without spring.” – Octavian Paller

37. "I’m springing it on you…winter is over!"

pixabay_apnear40

39. “In the spring, at the end of the day, you should smell like dirt.” – Margaret Atwood

40. "Putting a little spring in my step. Live life in full bloom."

41. "When the birds sing, you know it’s spring."

42. “An optimist is the human personification of spring.” – Susan J. Bissonette

43. "Spring sure does have a nice ring."

44. “Blossom by blossom the spring begins.” – Algernon Charles Swinburne

45. “In the spring, I have counted 136 different kinds of weather inside of 24 hours.” – Mark Twain

46. "Fear always springs from ignorance." - Ralph Waldo Emerson

47. "A person without a sense of humor is like a wagon without springs. It's jolted by every pebble on the road." - Henry Ward Beecher

Spring Quotes Funny to Boost Your Happiness

48. "Truth springs from argument amongst friends."

49. "One does not discover new lands without consenting to lose sight of the shore for a very long time." - Andre Gide

50. "Spring is the only revolutionary whose revolution has succeeded." — Marianne van Hirtum

51. “Spring makes the world a happy place You see a smile on every face. Flowers come out and birds arrive, Oh, isn’t it grand to be alive?”

52. “Springtime is the land awakening. The March winds are the morning yawn.” – Lewis Grizzard

53. “In springtime, love is carried on the breeze. Watch out for flying passion or kisses whizzing by your head.” – Emma Racine deFleur

pixabay

54. “It is spring again. The earth is like a child that knows poems by heart.” — Rainer Maria Rilke

55. “What a strange thing! to be alive, beneath cherry blossoms.” — Kobayashi Issa

Spring Quotes Funny to Bring You to Joy

56. “Spring work is going on with joyful enthusiasm.” — John Muir

57. "The day the Lord created hope was probably the same day he created Spring." - Bernard Williams

58. “The only thing that could spoil a day was people. People were always the limiters of happiness except for the very few that were as good as spring itself.” – Ernest Hemingway

59. “If people did not love one another, I really don’t see what use there would be in having any spring.” — Victor Hugo

60. "When spring came, even the false spring, there were no problems except where to be happiest." - Ernest Hemingway

Pixabay

61. “Spring shows what God can do with a drab and dirty world.” — Virgil A. Kraft

62. "If we had no winter, the spring would not be so pleasant." - Anne Bradstreet

63. "Spring has returned. The Earth is like a child that knows poems." - Rainer Maria Rilke

64. “Spring shows what God can do with a drab and dirty world.” — Virgil A. Kraft

65. “The first day of spring is one thing, and the first spring day is another. The difference between them is sometimes as great as a month.” – Henry Van Dyke

66. “The promise of spring’s arrival is enough to get anyone through the bitter winter!” — Jen Selinsky

j-lee-unsplash

As we end our journey through the funny spring quotes, let's reflect on the charm this season gives us.

Spring with its playful breezes and playful dances of blossoms. It reminds us that even in life's problems, a good laugh can be the way from a bad mood.

Spring quotes

These spring quotes are formulated with the energy of humor. They have taken us through a garden of laughter, where each holds a delightful surprise. As we take our journeys of growth and transformation, let's carry the spirit of these spring quotes with us. Like spring, let's remember that life is a masterpiece woven from laughter and tears. 

Photo: mark-olsen-unsplash

scraped_articles.title: 3 Airplane Passengers Arrested at Nashville Airport Because of Ghost Bag
scraped_articles.meta_description: 3 Airplane Passengers Arrested at Nashville Airport Because of Ghost Bag
scraped_articles.content:
3 Airplane Passengers Arrested at Nashville Airport Because of Ghost Bag

3 Airplane Passengers Arrested at Nashville Airport Because of Ghost Bag

Three female airplane passengers were arrested following a "ghost bag" incident at Nashville International Airport (BNA), United States (US). Last weekend, officers were called after Southwest Airlines found an unaccompanied suspicious bag.

Quoting The Sun US, Tuesday, November 21, 2023, a "ghost bag" is luggage registered by someone who does not board the plane to be picked up at the destination by someone else. Upon inspection by airline staff, the "unaccompanied" bag reportedly contained new clothes from luxury brand Lululemon, receipts, a fake driver's license, and credit cards.

According to officials, the three women who arrived at the airport to collect the bag were believed to be part of a fraudulent scheme. They claimed to have purchased the clothes using stolen banking information and returned them for cash or store credit.

The three women were arrested at the airport, and a search of their car revealed $20,000 worth of gift cards, receipts, $9,000 worth of products, and 10 credit cards.

Torryiel Griggs (30) was charged with stealing property, criminal simulation, and credit card fraud. While Griggs remains jailed on $100,000 bail, what sets the other two women's faces is unknown.

Police noted that "ghost bags" are often used as a way to distribute drugs or other illegal items. An airport spokesperson told WSMV that "ghost bags" are not specifically tracked by the airport or the US Transportation Security Administration (TSA). Still, all baggage is checked for explosives and weapons.

The airline spokesperson told the outlet that Southwest Airlines does not require passengers to "accompany" their luggage on domestic flights. The airline's passengers were surprised by the requirement, with one passenger calling it "scary."

One of them was Jennifer Larson, who was flying to South Dakota. She said, "It's kind of scary to think that people can put whatever they want in a suitcase and ship it. I hope they regulate. If a bag doesn't have a passenger in it, they don't let it on the plane."

"I mean, it makes sense. If you're not on the plane, your bag shouldn't be on the plane," she adds.

Meanwhile, Tracey Prue, who is visiting her daughter in Texas, said, "These criminals are just looking for ways to manipulate the system. A baggage claim is so easy. It's been happening for years, so when you're busy and flying, make sure you're aware that your bag is there."

"Be aware of your surroundings. If you see a bag wandering around alone with no one around, maybe let someone know," she added.

scraped_articles.title: Quotes About Revenge: Understanding the Dark Side of Human Nature
scraped_articles.meta_description: These revenge quotes will inspire you to take action and know your boundaries.
scraped_articles.content:
Quotes About Revenge: Understanding the Dark Side of Human Nature

These revenge quotes will inspire you to take action and know your boundaries. (Photo by Muhmed Alaa El-Bank on Unsplash)

Quotes About Revenge: Understanding the Dark Side of Human Nature

Revenge is a powerful and complex emotion that has been part of human nature for centuries. 

In this article, we will explore some of the most thought-provoking quotes about revenge. These quotes help us understand why the desire for revenge can consume us and how it reflects the dark aspects of our humanity.

Many great minds, from philosophers to writers, have shared their thoughts on revenge. They capture the dark side and its consequences in memorable quotes.

Quotes about revenge highlight feelings of anger, resentment, or a desire for revenge as a response to injustice.

Instead of allowing injustice to continue, these words will inspire you to take action and know your boundaries.

Let’s read these 35 quotes about revenge below and let them ignite your spirit and inspire you to face adversity.

A. Quotes About Revenge to Define Its Emotions

1. "Revenge is always the weak pleasure of a little and narrow mind." — Juvenal

2. "To exact revenge for yourself or your friends is not only a right, it’s an absolute duty." — Stieg Larsson

3. "Revenge proves its own executioner." — John Ford

4. "An eye for an eye will only make the whole world blind." — Mahatma Gandhi

5. "While seeking revenge, dig two graves – one for yourself." — Douglas Horton

6. "Revenge is sweet and not fattening." — Alfred Hitchcock

7. "The best revenge is massive success." — Frank Sinatra

8. "Nothing inspires forgiveness quite like revenge." — Scott Adams

9. "Revenge, at first though sweet, Bitter ere long back on itself recoils." — John Milton

10. "Revenge is a kind of wild justice." — Francis Bacon

11. "He who seeks revenge should remember to dig two graves." — Chinese Proverb

12. "Revenge, the sweetest morsel to the mouth that ever was cooked in hell." — Walter Scott

13. "The best revenge is to be unlike him who performed the injury." — Marcus Aurelius

14. "Revenge is an act of passion; vengeance of justice. Injuries are revenged; crimes are avenged." — Samuel Johnson

15. "The pleasure of revenge is a fleeting emotion, but the pain of regret lasts forever." — Unknown

B. Provoking Quotes About Revenge

1. “The man who seeks revenge digs two graves.” – Ken Kesey

2. “Revenge may be wicked, but it’s natural.”—William Makepeace Thackeray

3. “However miserable you make us, we shall still have the revenge of thinking that your cruelty arises from your greater misery.”― Emily Brontë

4. “A need for revenge can burn long and hot. Especially if every glance in a mirror reinforces it.”― Suzanne Collins

5. "Don't get mad. Get even." - Joseph Kennedy

6. “I’m a fighter. I believe in the eye-for-an-eye business. I’m no cheek turner. I got no respect for a man who won’t hit back. You kill my dog, you better hide your cat.” — Muhammad Ali

7. “There is nothing wrong with revenge. The wrong has already been done, or there would be no need to even the score.”― Ashly Lorenzana

8. "The more you try to crush your true nature, the more it will control you. Be what you are. No one who really loves you will stop." - Cassandra Clare

9. "Revenge is often like biting a dog because the dog bit you." - Austin O'Malley

10. “Two wrongs don’t make a right, but neither does one. Revenge may seem petty by day, but on some nights she becomes Justice.” – Ashly Lorenzana

C. Quotes About Revenge to Defend Yourself

1. "A strong person is not the one who doesn't cry. A strong person is one who is quiet and sheds tears for a moment, and then picks up the sword and fights again." - Unknown

2. "The greatest revenge is to accomplish what others say you cannot do." - Unknown

3. “Revenge is what I want. Nothing but pure unadulterated revenge. But my mother brought me up to be a lady.”—J. P. Donleavy

4. “When you begin a journey of revenge, start by digging two graves: one for your enemy, and one for yourself.” ― Jodi Picoult

5. “Revenge is not a noble sentiment, but it is a human one.”—Rudy Giuliani

6. “If you feel like you need revenge, getting it won’t help you.”― Steve Maraboli

7. “Inner peace is best achieved when you realize the best revenge is no revenge”― Joe Mehl

8. "Never underestimate a person's ability to defend themselves, especially when it comes to their own survival." - Unknown

9. “Revenge is not worthy of you. If you concentrate on revenge, you will keep those wounds fresh that would otherwise have healed.”—Adeline Yen Mah

10. “Don’t waste time on revenge. The people who hurt you will eventually face their own karma.” – Unknown

scraped_articles.content:
What are The Luckiest Signs in the Year of the Dragon 2024?

2024 is the year of the 'Wood Dragon.'

What are The Luckiest Signs in the Year of the Dragon 2024?

The Chinese Horoscope celebrates its New Year a little later than January 1. Chinese New Year begins on Saturday, February 10, 2024.

This celebration celebrates changes in animal signs, elemental relationships, and overall cycles.

2024 is the year of the 'Wood Dragon.' It is known for power, prosperity, and good fortune.

According to the Chinese Horoscope for 2024, the luckiest zodiac signs are the monkey, rooster, and pig.

Then followed by cows, rabbits, goats, and dogs.

Rat: Expect career and social momentum, needing adaptability and trick.

Ox: Stability and financial success are possible with careful planning.

Tiger: Challenges may appear, but strength and decision will help solve them.

Rabbit: Positive changes in love and creativity will happen soon.

Dragon: A special year for leadership opportunities and self-reflection.

Snake: Stability in relationships and personal growth can be achieved with patience.

Horse: Opportunities for social activity and professional growth await with productive collaboration.

Goat: Spiritual growth and balanced relationships need gratitude and compassion.

Monkey: Challenges may come, but adaptability and resolution will produce effective solutions.

Rooster: Progress in your career and public recognition with effective communication.

Dog: Significant family and career changes might need flexibility and patience.

Pig: Financial stability and moments of joy are ready, with gratitude as a key.

scraped_articles.title: Weki Meki Reportedly Will Disband After Releasing Their Final Single
scraped_articles.meta_description: Fantagio, Weki Meki's agency, announced the disbandment on June 7.
scraped_articles.content:
Weki Meki Reportedly Will Disband After Releasing Their Final Single

Fantagio, Weki Meki's agency, announced the disbandment on June 7.

Weki Meki Reportedly Will Disband After Releasing Their Final Single 

Weki Meki, a K-pop girl group, will reportedly disband after releasing their final single, "CoinciDestiny," on June 12. 

Weki Meki debuted in 2017. The group has been inactive for several years. 

The last time they released new music was their previous comeback in November 2021.

Disband Announcement

Fantagio, Weki Meki's agency, announced the disbandment on June 7.

They stated that the group would release one final single before going their separate ways.

View this post on Instagram

A post shared by 위키미키 (@weki_meki)

The single, titled "CoinciDestiny," will be released on June 12.

It marks the end of Weki Meki's seven-year journey as a group.

The title "CoinciDestiny" symbolizes the meeting that led to the formation of the group. This bond is unbreakable between members and fans.

Weki Meki's Debut

Weki Meki debuted in August 2017 with the extended playlist "Weme" and quickly gained popularity with their fresh and upbeat concepts, including hits like "Picky Picky," "COOL," and "Crush".

The members of Weki Meki will likely pursue solo projects and other works after the disbandment.

scraped_articles.title: 50 Minecraft Jokes That Will Make You Giggle

scraped_articles.content:
50 Minecraft Jokes That Will Make You Giggle

50 Minecraft Jokes That Will Make You Giggle

Minecraft jokes are a fun way to enjoy one of the most popular games in the world.

If you’re a fan of the game, you know it’s full of adventure, creativity, and surprises. Minecraft Jokes bring together the excitement of the game and humor, making them perfect for players of all ages.

For those who might not know, Minecraft is a video game where players can build, explore, and survive in a blocky, open world. You can create anything from simple houses to complex cities. This game is loved by many for its creativity and freedom. Learning about Minecraft jokes will help you understand the fun side of this amazing game.

In this article, we have selected some of the best Minecraft jokes from various sources, Wednesday (28/8/2024). Whether you are a long-time fan or a new player, these jokes will surely make you laugh. Without further ado, let's check the most hilarious Minecraft jokes that will brighten your day.

The Best Minecraft Jokes

1. What did the zombie say to the villager? "Nice to eat you!"

2. Why can't the Ender Dragon read a book? Because he always starts at the end!

3. How did Alex make the skeleton laugh? Tickled its funny bone!

4. How do Minecraft players avoid getting sunburn? They use Sunblock!

5. What's Steve's favourite sport? Boxing!

6. What do you call a cow with no legs in Minecraft? Ground beef!

7. What’s a skeleton’s favorite room in the house? The living room!

8. What do ocelots and potato chips have in common? You can’t just have one.

9. Why didn’t the ghast ever do its chores? It Nether had the time.

10. What instruments do skeletons play? Trom-Bone.

11. I'm a huge fan of the outdoors. Just today I spent all day on my farm in Minecraft!

12. Why are there no cars in Minecraft? Because the streets are always blocked off!

13. How does Steve keep fit? He runs around the block.

14. Why didn't the Enderman cross the road? Because he teleported instead!

15. What is a witch's favourite subject at school? Spelling!

16. What's a Ghast's favorite country? The Nether-Lands!

17. Why are zombies good at Minecraft? Dead-ication!

18. What kind of music do Minecraft players listen to? Bed-rock and roll!

19. What kind of parties do Minecraft players have? Block parties.

20. Why did the ocelot cross the road? It spotted a Creeper on the other side.

21. What do you call it when you build a second portal on Minecraft? Anether Nether.

22. Why doesn't Steve work in an office? He isn't very good at thinking outside the box.

23. What do you call a 25-year-old male who plays Minecraft? Single.

24. What’s a creeper’s favorite song? “TNT” by AC/DC!

25. Where does Steve rent movies? Blockbuster.

The Most Hilarious Minecraft Jokes

26. Why couldn't the skeleton cross the road? It didn't have the guts!

27. Why did the creeper go to the party? He wanted to have a blast!

28. Why did the Minecraft player bring string to the bar? He wanted to craft a bow-tie.

29. A creeper walks into a restaurant. And everyone dies.

30. What is a Creeper’s favorite subject at school? Hisssssstory.

31. How do you make people change direction in Minecraft? Block their path.

32. How does Steve measure his shoe size? In square feet.

33. Why wasn’t the Creeper invited to the party? He had an explosive personality.

34. What do you call a Minecraft boy band? New Kids on the Block!

35. Why don’t some people ever tell Minecraft jokes? Because people might think they’re square.

36. Why did the Enderman never make eye contact? He was a bit shy!

37. How does Steve keep his pants up? With a diamond belt, of course!

38. Why did the witch not finish her food? She was practicing potion control!

39. What do skeletons order at the village restaurant? Spare ribs!

40. What did Steve say to Alex? "I dig you!"

41. Steve walks into a bar... The bartender says, “Sorry, we don’t serve miners!”

42. Where do miners sleep? On their bed-rocks!

43. Why did Steve need mouthwash after destroying the mobs? Because he had bat breath!

44. What did Alex say to the skeleton? "I've got a bone to pick with you!"

45. What do you call a Zombie Pigman that steals your sword? A ham-burglar!

46. My ocelot was having trouble watching YouTube... It turns out, the video was just on paws!

47. What did the sheep say after trying to eat a cactus? “Accidents wool happen.”

48. How do you make a water bed in Minecraft? Use water blocks!

49. What happens when Minecraft characters turn 16? They start growing cubic hair.

50. It’s hard to score against a basketball player who plays Minecraft. He’s always blocking.

scraped_articles.title: Profiles of NewJeans Members Who are Now Fighting Against South Korea's Biggest Agency
scraped_articles.meta_description: This group had five members: Minji, Hanni, Danielle, Haerin, and Hyein.
scraped_articles.content:
Profiles of NewJeans Members Who are Now Fighting Against South Korea's Biggest Agency

NewJeans is a famous South Korean girl group formed by ADOR, a subsidiary of HYBE. It consists of five members: Minji, Hanni, Danielle, Haerin, and Hyein.

Recently, these members have made headlines for their decision to fight against their agency regarding management issues. Here’s a closer look at each member's profile and current situation.

Minji

Minji's full name is Kim Minji (김민지). She was born on May 7, 2004. Her position in the group is rapper and vocalist. This idol's height is 169 cm (5'7"). Her nationality is Korean.

Minji is known for her strong vocal abilities and energetic dance skills. She has also been recognized for her charismatic stage presence and is often seen as the leader figure within the group. Currently, she is the Channel Brand Ambassador.

She trained at YG Entertainment before joining ADOR and was featured in BTS's "Permission to Dance" music video.

Hanni

Hanni Pham (Phạm Ngọc Hân) is the full name of Hanni. She was born on October 6, 2004. This vocalist of NewJeans is 162 cm (5'4") in height.

This Vietnamese-Australian idol is celebrated for her artistic contributions, including writing lyrics for the group's songs. She is fluent in English, Korean, and Vietnamese. Currently, Hanni is the GUCCI Global Brand Ambassador.

Hanni was previously involved in dance performances in Melbourne before auditioning for NewJeans.

Danielle

Danielle Marsh was born on April 11, 2005. Her position in the group is vocalist. Danielle's height is 165 cm (5'5"). She is Korean-Australian. Besides being an idol, she is currently a CELINE Global Ambassador.

Danielle is charming and known for her beautiful visuals and vocal talent. She has been active in entertainment since childhood.

As a child, she participated in various television shows and trained under YG Entertainment before joining NewJeans.

Haerin

Haerin or Kang Haerin (강해린) was born on May 15, 2006. This 18-year-old idol is a vocalist in her group. Haerin's height is 164.5 cm (5'5"), and she is Korean.

Haerin is noted for her captivating visuals and strong performance skills. She has gained attention as a brand ambassador for luxury brands, including Dior Global Brand Ambassador.

She was street-cast and trained under Source Music before debuting with NewJeans.

Hyein

The last one is Lee Hyein (이혜인). Hyein was born on April 21, 2008, which means she is the maknae, or the youngest member.

The group's vocalist is 170 cm (5'7") in height. Like other members, Hyein is a Louis Vuitton Brand Ambassador.

As the youngest member, Hyein brings fresh energy to the group. She has been involved in music from a young age, and before joining NewJeans, she was part of a children's music group.

Current Situation

The members of NewJeans have recently taken a stand against ADOR due to dissatisfaction with the agency's management practices. They held a press conference on November 28, 2024, announcing their contract termination.

This move has sparked significant media attention and discussions about artist rights within the K-pop industry.

scraped_articles.title: 5 Archaeology Movies That Uncover Ancient Mysteries
scraped_articles.meta_description: Archaeology is the study of ancient cultures and their artifacts. It helps us understand how people lived in the past and what they valued.
scraped_articles.content:
5 Archaeology Movies That Uncover Ancient Mysteries

They remind us of the importance of understanding our past and encourage curiosity about the world around us. Whether you are drawn to history, action, or mystery, these films will surely entertain and inspire. (Photo by StockCake-Desert Archaeological Dig)

5 Archaeology Movies That Uncover Ancient Mysteries

Archaeology is the study of ancient cultures and their artifacts.

It helps us understand how people lived in the past and what they valued. Movies about archaeology often take viewers on exciting adventures, exploring lost cities, uncovering hidden treasures, and solving ancient mysteries. These films blend history with imagination, making them both entertaining and educational. Here are five archaeology movies that capture the thrill of discovery while revealing fascinating insights into ancient worlds.

This film is based on the true story of British explorer Percy Fawcett, who ventured into the Amazon rainforest in search of a lost civilization called "Z."

1. The Lost City of Z (2016)
Genre: Adventure/Action
IMDB: 6,6/10
Rotten Tomatoes: 86%

The movie follows his journey as he faces many challenges and dangers in the jungle.

It highlights the mystery of ancient cultures and raises questions about what lies undiscovered in the depths of the Amazon. The stunning visuals and deep exploration of Fawcett's obsession make it a compelling watch for anyone interested in archaeology.

This classic adventure film features archaeologist Indiana Jones, who is on a quest to find the Ark of the Covenant before it falls into the wrong hands.

2. Raiders of the Lost Ark (1981 )Genre: Adventure/Action IMDB: 8,4/10Rotten Tomatoes: 93%

Set in the 1930s, the movie takes viewers around the globe, from the jungles of South America to ancient temples.

Combining action, suspense, and humor, "Raiders of the Lost Ark" entertains and introduces audiences to significant artifacts and historical lore.

In this science fiction film, a team discovers an ancient device that allows travel to distant planets. The story begins when an archaeological team uncovers a mysterious stone circle in Egypt that leads them to a new world.

3. Stargate (1994)Genre: Sci-fi/AdventureIMDB: 7/10Rotten Tomatoes: 53%

Exploring this alien planet, they encounter ancient civilizations and face powerful beings.

"Stargate" creatively blends archaeology with science fiction, sparking curiosity about ancient structures and their potential connections to other worlds.

Based on real events, "The Dig" tells the story of an excavation at Sutton Hoo, an important archaeological site in England. Set in the late 1930s, the film follows a widow who hires an archaeologist to dig on her estate.

4. The Dig (2021)Genre: Drama/Melodrama IMDB: 7,1/10Rotten Tomatoes: 88%

They uncover a remarkable burial ship filled with treasures from the Anglo-Saxon period.

The movie beautifully portrays the dedication of those involved in archaeology and highlights how artifacts can reveal stories about ancient societies.

In this adventurous film, treasure hunter Benjamin Gates embarks on a quest to find hidden treasure that dates back to the founding of America. The story begins with clues embedded in historical artifacts, including the Declaration of Independence.

5. National Treasure National Treasure (2004)
Genre: Adventure/Action
IMDB: 6,9/10
Rotten Tomatoes: 46%

Gates and his team must solve puzzles and navigate through traps to uncover the secrets of America's past.

"National Treasure" combines history with thrilling action, making it an exciting watch for anyone interested in archaeology and adventure.

These five movies demonstrate how archaeology can lead to thrilling discoveries and provide a glimpse into ancient cultures.

Each film offers a unique perspective, from real-life explorations to imaginative adventures. They remind us of the importance of understanding our past and encourage curiosity about the world around us. Whether you are drawn to history, action, or mystery, these films will surely entertain and inspire.

scraped_articles.title: Viral: A Rare Pink Pigeon Has Been Spotted in Manchester
scraped_articles.meta_description: This pink bird was seen twice in early September, making many residents curious.
scraped_articles.content:
Viral: A Rare Pink Pigeon Has Been Spotted in Manchester

This pink bird was seen twice in early September, making many residents curious.

Viral: A Rare Pink Pigeon Has Been Spotted in Manchester

A pink pigeon has appeared in Bury, Greater Manchester, surprising local residents. 

This pink bird is different from other gray pigeons. This pink bird was seen twice in early September. This makes many residents curious. 

(Photo: X @Heywoodharriet_)

Pink pigeon stand out for their bright coloring compared to other gray pigeons. 

Some people wonder whether the pink color is natural or fake.

The pink pigeon received food from people and roosted on the house's roof.

Even police officers on routine patrol have seen it.

Some people suspect it may have been used for a gender reveal party. Since the bird's color is pink, it may represent a baby girl.

(Photo: X @Heywoodharriet_)

Has anyone else seen this pink pigeon in Bury and does anyone know why it is pink?! #Bury #pinkpigeon #pigeon #pink #bird pic.twitter.com/wrx63R21TP

— Harriet Heywood (@Heywoodharriet_) September 9, 2023

Officers are out on foot patrol this afternoon as part of #OpHeartbeat

Officers quickly came across a rare pink pigeon in the town centre.

Have you seen Burys Pink Pigeon yet? Let us know & come and say hi when you spot us ❤️ pic.twitter.com/6mCQqsKsoq

— Bury North Police (GMP) (@GMPBuryNorth) September 15, 2023

According to Republic World, this is not the first time a pink pigeon has gone viral. 

A similar pink pigeon was found in Madison Square Park in New York City.

Most likely, they were dyed for a gender reveal party and then rescued due to signs of malnutrition.

In the 2000s, cooking films became a popular genre.

They showcased the artistry and passion of chefs in the culinary world. Ranging from heartwarming stories to intense kitchen dramas, these chef movies capture the essence of what it means to cook. Here are five chef movies from the 2000s that added flavor to the cooking film scene and will surely make you hungry.

Chef Movies

Starring Jon Favreau, this feel-good movie follows a chef who starts a food truck after losing his job at a prestigious restaurant. With a heartwarming story and delicious Cuban sandwiches, "Chef" is a delightful watch for food lovers. You can stream it on Netflix.

Are you a food enthusiast or just looking for a good movie? These cooking films will fulfill your desire for great storytelling and delicious dishes. So grab some popcorn (or snacks) and get ready to indulge in culinary cinema with these chef movies from the 2000s. Happy watching!

scraped_articles.title: 5 Largest Automotive Shows in the US to Visit!
scraped_articles.meta_description: There's no better place for petrolheads to be at an auto show than anywhere else in the world - except behind the wheel of a fast car, of course.
scraped_articles.content:
5 Largest Automotive Shows in the US to Visit!

5 Largest Automotive Shows in the US to Visit!

There's no better place for petrolheads to be at an auto show than anywhere else in the world - except behind the wheel of a fast car, of course.

If you're also an enthusiast—whether for sleek new looks, futuristic concepts, or vintage vehicles—we've listed the five biggest auto shows in the United States.

Throughout this article, several auto shows in the United States are featured! Here are all five.

1. Chicago Auto Show

Since 1901, the Chicago Auto Show has been the country's largest and longest-running auto show, occupying 1.2 million square feet of space at the McCormick Place complex.

It is held annually in February.

trstdly.com

2. North American International Auto Show

Often referred to by its original name, the Detroit Auto Show.

This show has been going on since 1907, except for 10 years during World War II, when the production and sale of cars to the public was temporarily halted to support the war effort.

trstdly.com


3. San Francisco International Auto Show

This is the largest auto show in Northern California and the second-largest in the Western United States. It debuted in 1958 as a protest against foreign car dealers being denied participation in local domestic auto shows.

So, some rebels got together and created the Import Car Show, which was later renamed the Import Car Show in 1982.

trstdly.com

4. New York International Auto Show

The New York International Auto Show is held annually in Manhattan, New York City, in late March or early April. It is held at the Jacob Javits Convention Center.

The show usually opens on or just before Easter weekend and closes on the first Sunday after Easter.

trstdly.com

5. Grand National Roadster Show

Thousands of hot-rods, custom cars, and roadsters provide one of the coolest spectacles for automotive enthusiasts.

The main feature is the America's Most Beautiful Roadster Award.

trstdly.com

scraped_articles.title: Billie Eilish Is the Youngest 2 Oscar Winner in History
scraped_articles.meta_description: Billie Eilish Is the Youngest 2 Oscar Winner in History
scraped_articles.content:
Billie Eilish Is the Youngest 2 Oscar Winner in History

Billie Eilish Is the Youngest 2 Oscar Winner in History

Billie Eilish achieved an important career achievement at the 2024 Oscar Cup event. Held at the Dolby Theater in Los Angeles, USA, on Sunday (10/3/) local time.This 22-year-old woman won the trophy for the Best Original Song category.

She achieved this with her sister, Finneas, through "What Was I Made For?" for the movie Barbie.

In the 2024 Oscars, Billie and Finneas beat other candidates such as "I'm Just Ken", which is also the soundtrack of the Barbie movie, "The Fire Inside" (Flamin' Hot), "It Never Went Away" (American Symphony), and "Wahzhazhe (A Song for My People)" from the movie Killers of the Flower Moon.

This is the second Oscar trophy won by Billie Eilish. In 2022, she won a similar category trophy through the "No Time to Die" song for the James Bond film.

Several well-known media outlets, such as Time, People, Forbes, and many more, have noted that the "Bad Guy" singer is the youngest person to have received two Oscars.

While receiving the trophy, handed over by Ariana Grande as a presenter, Billie Eilish admitted that she did not expect to be the winner of the 2024 Oscar Cup.

"I had a nightmare about this last night," Billie Eilish said, reported by People. She continued, "I didn't think this could happen, I didn't expect it. I feel so lucky and honored."

"I'm so grateful for this song and this movie, and how they made me feel. (This trophy) is also for all those who felt affected by the movie, and felt its greatness," Billie Eilish continued.

During this event, Billie Eilish performed the song "What Was I Made For?" Her performance brought tears to the eyes of several stars sitting in the guest seats and was showered with applause from the audience.

Billie Eilish's appearance at the 2024 Oscar Cup has attracted public attention since appearing on the red carpet. She wore an Artists4Ceasefire pin on her black blazer.

Artists4Ceasefire is a campaign that began in October last year, urging the United States Congress and President Joe Biden to immediately call for a ceasefire in Gaza, Palestine, and Israel.

In addition to Billie, other artists who wore this pin include Finneas, Mark Ruffalo, Ava DuVernay, Ramy Youssef, and Quannah Chasinghorse.


In addition to Billie, other artists who wore this pin include Finneas, Mark Ruffalo, Ava DuVernay, Ramy Youssef, and Quannah Chasinghorse.

scraped_articles.content:
Robert Pattinson And Suki Waterhouse Are Officially Parents

Suki Waterhouse announced the baby weeks later after giving birth.

Robert Pattinson And Suki Waterhouse Are Officially Parents

Suki Waterhouse post a photo of herself holding a baby in Instagram.

After officially announcing her pregnancy of her child with Robert Pattinson a few months ago, now the 32-year-old singer seems to already give birth to the baby.

According to her recent Instagram post on Thursday, Suki Waterhouse holding a baby while the caption says, "Welcome to the world angel".

According to People, the couple privately welcomed their baby in March, with Waterhouse only announcing the birth weeks later.

Previously, Waterhouse last posted a photo of herself on Instagram looking very pregnant on February 28.

Suki Waterhouse announced her pregnancy in November 2023.

She first announced the prgnancy in a sweet reveal during her performance at the Corona Capital Festival in November 2023.

Then, months later the couple was spotted walking with a baby stroller despite their silent announcement.

Pattinson, dressed in a MoMa sweatshirt and a Patagonia jacket, had both hands in the stroller while Waterhouse walked by his side in a black trenchcoat.

After the official post, celebrities like Paris Hilton to Halsey left comments offering their congratulations, with the latter writing, “ROCKSTAR MOM!”

scraped_articles.title: 5 Classic Spanish Breakfasts To Kickstart Your Adventure In Spain
scraped_articles.meta_description: These classic Spanish breakfasts will get you ready to start your journey in Spain.
scraped_articles.content:
5 Classic Spanish Breakfasts To Kickstart Your Adventure In Spain

Starting your journey in Spain with a classic breakfast is a great idea. Spain is a beautiful country known for its delicious food. Spanish dishes have influenced cuisines worldwide. (Photo by Bakd&Raw by Karolin Baitinger on Unsplash)

5 Classic Spanish Breakfasts To Kickstart Your Adventure In Spain

Spanish food has lots to offer, from yummy seafood to light breakfasts.

So, no matter what you like and whenever you want, you'll find something to enjoy.

© 2023 trstdly.com

In this article, we'll look at some traditional Spanish breakfasts you should definitely try when you're in Spain. These tasty dishes will help you get ready for your exciting adventure in this amazing country.

(Photo by Rosy Ko on Unsplash)

1. Spanish Tomato Toast

Tomato toast is a classic staple breakfast in Spain. The tomato is rubbed over the toast and seasoned with olive oil and salt. The Spanish tomato toast is very popular and sold in every bar all over Spain. (Photo by Jennifer Woodard Maderazo on Flickr/CC BY 2.0)

If you love sweet dishes, you can start your day by eating churros con chocolate. The name basically means chocolate with churros. The churros are served with a cup of hot chocolate for the dipping. (Photo by Spencer Davis on Unsplash)

2. Churros con Chocolate

3. Tortilla de Patatas

Tortilla de Patatas is also known as the Spanish omelet. The main ingredients of tortilla de patatas are potatoes and eggs. (Photo by blackieshoot on Unsplash)

First, the potato is cut and fried. Then, mix the potato with beaten eggs and fry it in the pan with olive oil. This dish is very popular in Spain and other Spanish-speaking countries. (Photo by FabianPerezRego on Flickr/CC BY-ND 2.0)

4. Bocadillos

Sandwich is a classic breakfast in the world. Bocadillos is a Spanish sandwich made with Spanish bread. It's usually filled with eggs, meat, jamon (Spanish cured ham), cheese, and potatoes. Bocadillos is famous as a tasty and cheap breakfast in Spain. (Photo by Mikespanish on Wikimedia/CC BY-SA 3.0)

5. Empanada

Last but not least is empanada. Empanada originated from Galicia, Spain, and is famous in other South European and Latin American countries. (Photo by Aleyda Balderas on Pexels)

Empanada is a type of fried pastry. It is usually filled with meat, seafood, cheese, or other ingredients. Empanada is a very versatile dish. It can be eaten as breakfast, lunch, dinner, or even a snack.

(Image by Hans from Pixabay)

scraped_articles.title: Animal Quotes: 30 Timeless Messages for Animal Lovers
scraped_articles.meta_description: Animal has been our source of joy and inspiration for a long time. These beautiful animal quotes explore the unique bond between human and animals.
scraped_articles.content:
Animal Quotes: 30 Timeless Messages for Animal Lovers

Animal Quotes: 30 Timeless Messages for Animal Lovers

Animal lovers, get ready to be inspired! In this article, we present some wonderful animal quotes. These timeless messages highlight the unique bond between humans and animals. Through these animal quotes, we can see that animals have a lot to teach us about life, love, and everything. 

Join us as we explore these animal quotes below. So sit back, relax, and let these quotes warm your heart and remind you of the magic that animals bring into our lives.

Inspirational Animal Quotes

  • "You can judge a man's true character by the way he treats his fellow animals." - Paul McCartney

  • "The greatness of a nation and its moral progress can be judged by the way its animals are treated." - Mahatma Gandhi

  • "The more I learn about people, the more I like my dog." - Mark Twain

  • "If having a soul means being able to feel love and loyalty and gratitude, then animals are better off than a lot of humans." — James Herriot

  •  "Dogs are our link to paradise. They don't know evil or jealousy or discontent." — Milan Kundera

  • "Any glimpse into the life of an animal quickens our own and makes it so much the larger and better in every way." — John Muir

  • "An animal's eyes have the power to speak a great language." — Martin Buber

  •  "Pets are humanizing. They remind us we have an obligation and responsibility to preserve and nurture and care for all life." — James Cromwell

  • "Animals are sentient, intelligent, perceptive, funny and entertaining. We owe them a duty of care as we do to children." — Michael Morpurgo

  • "Our task must be to free ourselves…by widening our circle of compassion to embrace all living creatures and the whole of nature and its beauty." — Albert Einstein

Heartwarming Animal Quotes

  • "Animals are reliable, many full of love, true in their affections, predictable in their actions, grateful and loyal. Difficult standards for people to live up to." - Alfred A. Montapert

  • "I think having an animal in your life makes you a better human." — Rachael Ray

  • "The best therapist has fur and four legs." - Unknown

  • "Until one has loved an animal, a part of one's soul remains unawakened." - Anatole France

  • "The smallest feline is a masterpiece." - Leonardo da Vinci

  • "Such short little lives our pets have to spend with us, and they spend most of it waiting for us to come home each day. It is amazing how much love and laughter they bring into our lives and even how much closer we become with each other because of them." — John Grogan

  • "You cannot share your life with a dog…or a cat, and not know perfectly well that animals have personalities and minds and feelings." — Jane Goodall
  • "Dogs don't make judgments about physical appearance or abilities, and they don't care how big your house is or what you do for a living. They care about the quality of your character and your capacity to love." — Elizabeth Eiler

  • "Animals have a much better attitude to life and death than we do. They know when their time has come. We are the ones that suffer when they pass, but it's a healing kind of grief that enables us to deal with other griefs that are not so easy to grab hold of." — Emmylou Harris

Funny Animal Quotes

  • "My dog is half pit-bull, half poodle. Not much of a watchdog, but a vicious gossip!" - Craig Shoemaker

  • "I'm suspicious of people who don't like dogs, but I trust a dog when it doesn't like a person." - Unknown

  • "I asked the zookeeper if he had any unusual animals. He said he had a three-legged dog. I said, 'That's not unusual.' He said, 'No, but I also have a four-legged chicken!'" - Unknown

  • "I once decided not to date a guy because he wasn't excited to meet my dog. I mean, this was like not wanting to meet my mother." - Bonnie Schacter

  • "What do you call a pile of cats? A meowtain!" - Unknown

  • "My dog used to chase people on a bike a lot. It got so bad, finally, I had to take his bike away." - Unknown

  • "My cat thinks I'm the weird one." - Unknown

  • "Why did the cat sit on the computer? Because it wanted to keep an eye on the mouse!" - Unknown

  • "My cat is not lazy. She is just highly motivated to do nothing." - Unknown

  • "I'm not sure if my cat likes me or if I'm just warm." - Unknown

Author

Rizki Amelia Putri (Intern Writer)

scraped_articles.title: Top 10 Tourist Places In South India That Will Leave You Speechless
scraped_articles.meta_description: From the breathtaking Andaman and Nicobar islands to the relaxing Skandagiri Hills, here are the best tourist places in South India that will leave you in awe.
scraped_articles.meta_keywords: Tourist Places In South India,Places To Visit In South India,South India
scraped_articles.content:
Top 10 Tourist Places In South India That Will Leave You Speechless

Top 10 Tourist Places In South India That Will Leave You Speechless

South India is home to some of the most mesmerizing tourist places in the world. From stunning beaches to majestic temples and lush green mountains, South India has it all. Whether you're a history buff, a nature lover, or a beach enthusiast, there is something for everyone in this diverse and culturally rich region.

The tourist places in South India are known for their unique charm and beauty that leave visitors speechless. From the intricate carvings of ancient temples to the serene backwaters and bustling markets, each place has its own story to tell.

If you're looking to explore rich cultural heritage, indulge in mouth-watering cuisine, and be surrounded by breathtaking natural landscapes, South India is the place to be. With its warm and welcoming locals, vibrant traditions, and a mix of old-world charm and modernity, a trip to South India promises to be an unforgettable experience.

In this article, we will take you to some of the best places to visit in South India, according to various sources, Friday (9/2/2024). These charming places will surely leave you in awe and longing for more.

1. Andaman and Nicobar Islands

Located in the Bay of Bengal, the Andaman and Nicobar Islands boast some of the most breathtaking beaches in the world.

With crystal-clear waters and vibrant coral reefs, this archipelago is a haven for scuba diving and snorkeling enthusiasts.

Explore the lush rainforests and discover the indigenous flora and fauna, making it a perfect getaway for nature lovers.

Known as the cultural capital of Karnataka, Mysore is a city that personifies grandeur and heritage.

2. Mysore

The majestic Mysore Palace, also known as the Amba Vilas Palace, is a marvel of Indo-Saracenic architecture and a must-visit attraction.

Take a stroll in the beautiful Brindavan Gardens and witness the mesmerizing musical fountain show that will leave you spellbound.

3. Chikmagalur

Situated amidst the verdant Western Ghats, Chikmagalur is a paradise for coffee lovers and nature enthusiasts.

Trek through the picturesque hills and explore stunning waterfalls like the Jhari Falls and Hebbe Falls.

Visit the Mullayanagiri Peak, the highest peak in Karnataka, and witness the awe-inspiring panoramic views of the surroundings.

4. Wayanad

Nestled in the Western Ghats of Kerala, Wayanad is a land of misty mountains and lush greenery. Embark on a wildlife safari in the Wayanad Wildlife Sanctuary and spot elusive species like the Asiatic elephant and the Indian bison.

Explore the ancient Edakkal Caves, known for their prehistoric cave paintings that offer a fascinating glimpse into ancient civilizations.

5. Munnar

Renowned as the "Kashmir of South India," Munnar is a hill station that will leave you awestruck with its undulating tea plantations and mist-covered mountains.

Take a leisurely walk through tea gardens and indulge in a cup of freshly brewed tea while enjoying panoramic views of the verdant valleys. Visit the Eravikulam National Park, home to the endangered Nilgiri Tahr, and immerse yourself in the wonders of nature.

6. Araku Valley

Located in the Eastern Ghats of Andhra Pradesh, Araku Valley is a hidden gem that offers a refreshing retreat from the bustling city life.

Take a ride on the scenic Araku Valley Railway, known for its breathtaking views of lush green valleys and cascading waterfalls.

Visit the Borra Caves, famous for their limestone formations, and witness the magnificence of nature's artistry.

7. Ooty

Nestled in the lap of the Nilgiri Hills, Ooty is a breathtaking hill station that offers majestic landscapes and a pleasant climate. Known as the "Queen of Hill Stations," Ooty is filled with lush green tea gardens, scenic valleys, and beautiful lakes.

Take a ride on the famous Nilgiri Mountain Railway, visit the charming Botanical Gardens, or simply relax and enjoy the tranquility of this picturesque destination.

Another gem of South India, Kodaikanal, is a hill station paradise. Surrounded by dense forests, granite cliffs, and grassy hills, it is a nature lover's dream come true.

8. Kodaikanal

Explore the famous Kodaikanal Lake, go trekking in the serene hills, or visit the enchanting Bear Shola Falls.

Kodaikanal's pleasant weather and refreshing atmosphere provide an idyllic escape from the city hustle.

Rich in historical and architectural marvels, Badami is a hidden treasure of South India. Located in Karnataka, this ancient town offers a glimpse into India's rich past.

9. Badami

Marvel at the stunning rock-cut caves, temples, and intricate carvings that date back to the 6th century. The Bhutanatha Group of Temples and Agastya Lake are among the must-visit attractions that showcase the architectural brilliance of the Chalukya Dynasty.

10. Skandagiri Hills

For adventure seekers and nature lovers, Skandagiri Hills promises an exciting experience. Trek to the top and catch a breathtaking sunrise. The trail winds through lush forests and rocky paths. 

Feel the excitement and peace at the summit as you enjoy stunning views. Skandagiri Hills' magical charm will leave you amazed and create lasting memories.

scraped_articles.title: McDonald's Release "Remix Menu" Option. What Is That?
scraped_articles.meta_description: McDonald's Canada is now being a hot topic after releasing a new menu creation.
scraped_articles.content:
McDonald's Release "Remix Menu" Option. What Is That?

McDonald's Canada is now being a hot topic after releasing a new menu creation.

McDonald's Release "Remix Menu" Option. What Is That?

"Remix Menu" takes inspiration from customers' creative customizations.

As reported by Dexerto, McDonald's Canada is recently releasing a new option for its  customers, called 'Remix Menu'.

'Remix Menu' takes two classic menu items and combines them into a whole new creation.

The menu has four new items in total with three savory options and one dessert.

The “Remix Menu” draws inspiration from customers' creative and playful customizations of their favourite dishes.

This was stated by the fast food chain’s statement in a recent press release.

Here are 4 new creations from the menu:

1. Chicken Cheeseburger: A combo of the crispy chicken patty with a beef patty, all topped with cheddar cheese, a pickle, onions, ketchups and mustard on a toasty bun.

2. Surf 'N Turf Burger: A combo of two beef patties with a Filet-O-Fish patty! This one is topped with two slices of cheddar cheese, tangy pickles, onions, ketchup and mustard on a toasty bun.

3. Sweet Chili Junior Chicken: This sandwich will test your tastebuds with a crispy chicken patty, tangy sweet chili Thai sauce and mayo-style sauce and lettuce on a toasty bun.

4. Apple Pie McFlurry: This remix will be a mix of McDonald’s vanilla soft serve, caramel sauce and pieces of their apple pie.


These menus are available from now on until April 29th.

7 Space Battle Movies That Push the Limits and Fuel Your Imagination

Space battle movies have always been favorites among science fiction fans.

They take us to the vast reaches of space and engage us in epic battles between alien races, interstellar empires, and willful factions. These movies push the limits of our imagination with their incredible visual effects and thrilling action. If you're looking for cosmic-world entertainment, here are seven space battle movies you should check out.



Space Battle Movies

pinterest/alexandra ansara

1. Starship Troopers (1997)

  • IMDb: 7,3
  • Rotten Tomatoes: 72%

"Starship Troopers" is a classic space war movie. It follows a group of young soldiers fighting against an insectoid alien species. You can watch this action-packed film on Amazon Prime or Hulu.

  • IMDb: 7,7/10
  • Rotten Tomatoes: 87%
